1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA shwa kal+la rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 
1b2(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhi mo'i rgyal po// bem po dang / 
1b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / byang chub
1b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
1b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
2a1(rgyud): / ldan 'das ri bo bo ta lan/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing stsa la
2a2(rgyud): dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshong dang / a ti mug te ka sna tshogs mang pos
2a3(rgyud): legs par brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sA ya
2a4(rgyud): bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu
2a5(rgyud): borgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
2a6(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byeng chub
2b1(rgyud): / ldan 'das ri bo bo ta la na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing stsa la
2b2(rgyud): dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pakA da / mya ngan 'tshong dang / a ti mug te/ sna tshogs mang pos
2b3(rgyud): legs par brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sA ya
2b4(rgyud): bye ba brgya stong phrog dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu
2b5(rgyud): bor+g+ha snang zhig du mas yongs su bsgyur cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug ci
2b6(rgyud): po dang / tshangs pa dang / sgra'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad// de nas bye chu
3a1(rgyud): mas dpa' sems dpa' chan pa 'phags pa sman ngas gzugs dbang rgyu ga stan las langs te blags phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lja ngas la btsugs te/ thal
3a2(rgyud): pabatud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'dri don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying
3a3(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par blta bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las
3a4(rgyud): mnol nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang mi'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chuba'i
3a5(rgyud): du stsal nas/ bdag gis mongs pas mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snyid rje
3a6(rgyud): 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs dang / dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong bsrung ba dang / sra ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bkyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang ni don
3a7(rgyud): yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du bkur bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag la dge ba'i
3a8(rgyud): bskyed par 'gyur lags so// gapa ni gdon yod pa'i nagal ba'i snying po 'di nyen par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'dam sdig pa spyong ba'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am/ 'phags pa la kur
3b1(rgyud): klu dang / g.yo dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub
3b2(rgyud): par babyed/ sems can gzhan la ya sgrogs par bgyid cing / thun du 'gro skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi dug du gtad de/ rna bar bzlas brjod ba gyid la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams
3b3(rgyud): sems par bgyid de/ skur par ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun du 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / 
3b4(rgyud): gos pa ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang / ma bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyid na/ 
3b5(rgyud): rgyas stong gal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing / nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam du bgyis te khyim na 'chang bar bgyid dam/ rje dpon gyis skrag
3b6(rgyud): bgyis sam/ bzhad gad tsam gyi rgyus nyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus/ de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa lags pa
3b7(rgyud): 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis tsan dan nam/ ga bur ram glo rtsa zhig la khros sam/ yongs su slad de rdol btags nas/ bdag nyid la byugs
3b8(rgyud): natsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gla rtsi de 'di snyam du 'dis bdag la khros sam/ yangs su spad pas dri ma rnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi/ gzhan du na de nyid la bre ba da' bar bca
4a1(rgyud): lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang yang bu yang rung bas/ bsad gad tsam gyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar / 
4a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang sgyus mchod pa bgyid na yang de nyid sems can dmu rgod dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar/ tshul khrims dang / 
4a3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri bda' bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
4a4(rgyud): kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pa'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched dadu par
4a5(rgyud): chos brgyad la snang ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/ bcod ldan 'das das tshe 'di nyid la ba pon nyi shu na gcig 'tho
4a6(rgyud): 'gyur ta/ k+She shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di ste ste/ de'i lus pa nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis ning rnams byung bang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ lus mdangs dang
4a7(rgyud): ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye 'o mang po'i skyed du sdug pa dang / dbang po skyes par 'gyur
4a8(rgyud): yi 'tshad chab kyis mi 'tshal rgyal po'i mthus brog par rngo ma log par 'gyur ro// de'i lus kyi mnga' rnams rgyas par gyur te/ 
4b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pam lags so// don me pa zhags pa'i snying po thos pa 'am/ tshul ldan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu cing ba bgyis/ 
4b2(rgyud): na gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzi 'arjid dang mdangs 'phrogs par rngomi thog par 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid la 'thad par 'gyur ro// de la dad+ma
4b3(rgyud): rdegs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi bgyur te/ byad kyi 'jigs pa ma phags mkha' 'gro ma'i 'a
4b4(rgyud): bas lags te/ de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dran pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang mtshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// de la yang kyu rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang
4b5(rgyud): ra bsrung ba dang / slob pa dang sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang shang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ de la phan ro
4b6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te brgyad gang zhe na 'gum pa'i du ba su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong
4b7(rgyud): thugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro// ladra ba mi g.yob pa dang / rkang pa mi g.yo ba pa dang / ba
4b8(rgyud): ma mchis pa dang khre'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa shin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kha bub du'i chi ba'i dus byed par ni 'gyur ro// 'bum pa'i dus na yang slobs pa
5a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod
5a2(rgyud): bgyi'o// chang dang sha dang kun dong dang ke'u dang / srog skya dang / 'dus pa dang / lkog rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer byas srung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i 'gas pa'i snying pa chos kyi
5a3(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la mthu mches pa dang / mthu ma mchis pa la 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgrag par bgyi'o// slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud mi 'gyi'o// 'di ltar dri ma dang bral
5a4(rgyud): nga phrag dog dang sder sna spangs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
5a5(rgyud): rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags te sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lags so// chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad
5a6(rgyud): du kho nas thob pa lags so// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na/ 'di ltar bdag gi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang gzhan sdig pa
5a7(rgyud): spyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrag par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bak+Sha
5a8(rgyud): stsal to// sems can dag pa de de'i du ba la bab par shes khyod slos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mang du yin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi tsha'i dus na/ byang chu
5b1(rgyud): rnams la pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de das byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spun ram gzegs dbang phyug mig pa 'jams par bcom ldan 'das la bdi skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das
5b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la smon pa dang / skyab mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye ba'i tshogs
5b3(rgyud): chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsal/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa/ 
5b4(rgyud): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phya 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i
5b5(rgyud): rul phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
5b6(rgyud): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags
5b7(rgyud): pa krAn ras ka zigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// ta d+hA thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ e h+ye ti ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mI rI mI rI/ tsu du tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ si ri si ra/ tse
5b8(rgyud): bi ri bi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mai d+hA pad+mA hA s+thA/ ka la ga la/ gi se ke li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ prad bu d+h+ya/ d+hU bad+hA ga ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni gi Ni/ kuN+Ta ku Sh+Ta/ pad+ma bud d+has twa/ ga ra ka ra/ kaM
6a1(rgyud): ka/ bu rus sa/ ga As pra ba ta/ tsal tsa la/ sany+dza las rgyal/ btsul btsal/ arbaT/ ya rbam b+ha rA d+h+wa rA b+he re bI ri/ b+hu ru ThA R+Ya/ e h+ye he me hAkA ru tsi ka/ ma
6a2(rgyud): d+harat+pa lngas / tsa me tA / ASh+Ta/ yoSh+Tha \u0f7f/  sa d+ha A/ b+h+ya/ mas sa pa
6a3(rgyud): gtas tasra pra ti ma Ni/ sha nI ral/ dra la rdal/ tab ta/ thAg zhan/ ma / pham pa ru Na/  b+her/ pra n+dA da pa gaN/ ta tsaraH/ su dus rba/ tsa tsur+tha/ rba / 
6a4(rgyud): Ta su rba/ sa na ku m+WAr/ rung / bA sa ga dz+nyAn/ dre ba 'dzin pa ka/ bcu bi biH/ ga r+thar/ d+ha ra \u0f7fra/ d+ha d+ha ri/ d+hur d+hu r+ra/ tha sa ra/ b+har k+Shar/ yang yang / lam bar/ ha ma ra/ snga ma pa
6a5(rgyud): pa shA /  ma/ so/  pa ma mas dz+re ga~M rgya zum ma ldan 'das 'alags pastan sa gcig
6a6(rgyud): byug gis dpalas gsum kyis rnams dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'chab rtsams cad dang / gdon tha ma ya las bsdus
6a7(rgyud): sa shig/ gang cing bdag 'dzig pa dang / rgyam po nga / chom po dang kun po dag sa dang / rgya ga sa dang mtshan las yongs rdul ba ma n+ta/ kar+dz+dza k+Sha/ (
6a8(rgyud): kAN+Dub+h+yatsang 'ayin dri la/ bal brgyuH/ sau ra/ sa rgyas pra k+Shag ka/ ta btag/ da pa dam sems gams lag/ sadun mos sak+Sha masad yar mi 'i byung // 
6b1(rgyud): rdornga Ta mraThaShadzam/ Ti Ti Ti mre n+daT+Ta rdzaH/ ye pa tsa ba be ba re / e shwa ma ta shA pa mahAb+hU tra ga Na sarba rdza ka/ ba ca ru/ pa rab paka ra ka pa ka DA ka ku ma yaT/ ba rbak+ka
6b2(rgyud): / kyai seMn sa \u0f7f pa~M ka shwe ta ya~M d+ha pa sa te/ pAm Tas/ mA la d+har/ sarba d+ha she sas tams sas pe/ ga ma/ gas las kr-i ta/ karar+N+Naya/ nAnas na rbi/ au!/ waka/ 
6b3(rgyud): sa na ha ti ba ri bA tsaka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba ka ra ma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka sarba pra d+ha pe ri mo tsaka/ sarba A shA pa ra pu ra ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shwa a sa~M ka ra/ na mo stu te swA hA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'gru
6b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod pa kyis na mtshams med pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yangs su dag par bgyid do// mtshams bcad pa ni/ A la ru'i bdug pa 'gro/ 
6b5(rgyud): zhal ba dang / cha ba paM/ yungs kar dang / ser ldeng gi phur phul sogs pas so// rim pa thams cad la ni srud pas so// rang thams cad lan mar ram/ 'brumar ram/ chab la bzlas brjod pa gyis te ga tror bar bgyi
6b6(rgyud): kyang grol ba mtshon gyis so// byon pa la'i srung ba'i skud pas so// dug gsad pa la nis 'am chab kyis so// migand la ni srud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdabs par bgyi'o// san pa la zhi shing kar bi ris shing
6b7(rgyud): gis so// mtshams bcad pa 'i/ tshon sna lnga'i srud pa la lan nyi shu cu gcig bzlas brjod ba kyis te/ se ldeng gi pur bu bzhil bcings nas/ phyogs pa ni gzugs par bgyis na/ mtshams chen po bcing ba
6b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// thams cad bsrung ba ni skud pa'am/ chab pamathal bas so// gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so// rims rnams cad la ni spyad pa dkar bos so// g.yan pa dang / khyo dang / ldog pa dang / mgrin
7a1(rgyud): bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol
7a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gal te tshi ga gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing / smyung ba lan cig bgyis te/ bzlas brjod byas na de bskal pa bye ba khrag brgya stong du 'khor bar skye
7a3(rgyud): pas phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi bzlas brjod kyi las snga pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / bskul pa stong du bsogs pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro// lab ma
7a4(rgyud): nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsten pa tsam ma ma/ cho ga
7a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod pa nges par gnas na/ byen mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su
7a6(rgyud): mche bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang / 
7a7(rgyud): dkyil la khor dang phyug rgyarnams cad kyi ngas smra zhugs pa dang / dam ga thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par skyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'grang bar 'gyur ro// ga sngags
7a8(rgyud): tsam gyis// mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chung ngu na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas grub pa'i rus pa 'am/ gum pa'i sha' me/ gum pa
7b1(rgyud): dus pa'ag/ chung dkum pa lags bdaba'am/  ga sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur du/ sems can dgang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhal bar 'gyur ba dang
7b2(rgyud): mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis som nyi bskyed par mi bgyid na/ gang dag che sa mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba la smos kyang
7b3(rgyud): 'chal/ gang rigs kyi bu po'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge ston pa'am/ dge skyen ma 'am/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar rgya
7b4(rgyud): duma?/ brjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ bsgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bri bar bgyid/ drir 'jug par bgyid na de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par
7b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya sdong mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bcangs na// mthong ba'i ches la dge ba'i rtsab thams cad dang
7b6(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di nyid re shig kun chub par bgyi/ yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgo
7b7(rgyud): bamang pol sems par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas y-i/ bsams pa'i las thams cad ba kyis na thams cad
7b8(rgyud): gyur ro// dgos pa dang sa bye ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'phags pa spyad ngas gzigs dbang phyug lachog sbyin mngon sumadu ba'i' yang bas pa ba'i du dor yod pa'i
8a1(rgyud): / k+Sha / d+hA chub ses pa sa / sa thun pa gshegs dpang drun dang / ku gas sa da dang / skyem rje 'dan pa pa dang / 
8a2(rgyud): pa rgya mtshor ba 'phya byams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'phagasa~M pa stan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs ten gas phrag pa na
8a3(rgyud): tsagazang nas/ pus so g.yas pa'i spangs pa btsugs nas/ nyi ma'i 'od slar 'od zer srong 'phro zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs pa labyed pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su / 
8a4(rgyud): mabyung ba brgyad te/ yul gyi dkyil 'khor byas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snyi chen po yim thu yid la byed pa/ rigs pa ni yi 'jig rten
8a5(rgyud): phyin pa dang / snying brtse bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags 'char rnams kyi thA dgud pa khon nyid grub pam chog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad cag gas
8a6(rgyud): / com ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i chog zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying pa 'drim chis te/ 'di na pa'i dkyis kho 'on nyid rten ma snying por 'phags pa sna / 
8a7(rgyud): bya /  pa'i nyid grub pa sa pa'i kyis ma chen po'o sgyus d+ha dang / gas sngags dang / snying po sa par bya ba gas pa bdam pa rnam par grol ba dkyil 'bong nga mchog dang / sgrub pa gsad
8b1(rgyud): de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrag par bshI lo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang/  lal rdzing dang / kyis mchi dang / snron gyi chen po mang pa la khor can po'i mdun da/ 
8b2(rgyud): rig sngags grub pa'i chu'i dkyi ma'i bor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o// gaur yang dbang byan dang / dbang phyug cher po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / 8
8b3(rgyud): song gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub sgrub
8b4(rgyud): bklags pas grub pa dang / bsgoms pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags/ 
8b5(rgyud): shing brjod par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gzugs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa/ phag dpung pa'i mdog
8b6(rgyud): kaper bye ba dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang / sdes kyi klung po co'i snga lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
8b7(rgyud): skye bar bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag padab bsnyed rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smos sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byir gyes brlabs te/ 
8b8(rgyud): ngab kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob ces khyod gsar pa dam pa'i dam tshig sros shig/ phyogs bcu 'di bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi shing byin gyis brlabs pa gang+gA'i klung 'bum
9a1(rgyud): 4/ phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa
9a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngagapa 'di dag gso
9a3(rgyud): // oM bad+ya t+yan+tu/ matra ya mo b+hi sa shes rgyalas ma mdzin yon byo/ don me thugs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyi srid po mad na// byang chub sems dbya sems dpa' chen po'ipas
9a4(rgyud): baspyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po ta la 'di brag dang nags tshal dang / rtsi shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang
9a5(rgyud): bcas pa rnams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar 'dar por gyur to// rku gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams kyang
9a6(rgyud): 'khrug par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to// rtse gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to// de ma zag tu phyogs bcun sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rna
9a7(rgyud): kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa la
9a8(rgyud): so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems bdag la khyod kyis gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang sa
9b1(rgyud): shA ga/ ska ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsod pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying ba'i gzungs 'dasan gcig marjod pa cam kyis na'i mod la phyogs bcu ba dad pa nas gang+gA'i klungs la byes
9b2(rgyud): rgya stong da byes tha~Mng ldan bzhin gshegs pa'i byag brgyang ste/ spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sku gsung ste/ gsungs ba tsam gyi modo la sngon bskal pa ba rgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa
9b3(rgyud): dmas rnams par bgyid/ zhig par brjid do// sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do// sdig pa dang sems can gdug pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol 'dam
9b4(rgyud): / 9dza ra ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/ 'di la the tshom mi 'gyi'o// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchod sbyin lta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so// rig sngags 'di'i cho ga bsku
9b5(rgyud): pani 'di yin te/ rig sngags 'char gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos par bgyi'o// byams pa dang / snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po zod la mchog tu snying brtse bar
9b6(rgyud): 'gas pa stan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi ro'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o// sa gad rba bdug padag / dri dang / phreng ba dang / phyag ba dang / mar med dbul bar bgyi'o// chos brgyan dam/ chos
9b7(rgyud): bral ba sgru pa'i bzlas brjod kyi mag sakyi'o// ri sa re gzugs kyi mthun du thog par skyel yo krungs cas nam don yod pa'i sngags pa'i snying po lan brtsa rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa kyi'o// chog grazhan ma
9b8(rgyud): draba'i rgyal po'i cu rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyis te cha ba dang / yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu gcig tu bcing bar bgyi'o// g.yang sngags kyis ni dpa
10a1(rgyud): khaskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgyas su dadabang bsrung bar bgyi yod de'i 'og tu don yod gags pa'i gsang pa'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyi'o// bzlas padro ton
10a2(rgyud): btsam gyis de'i yod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro ba'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'thung du bzlas brjod bgyes par 'gyur ro// bzlas badzad rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'ab na
10a3(rgyud): sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grags pa'i lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa
10a4(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'tshang srid dga' ba dang / spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa'i rtags dang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra
10a5(rgyud): 'byin no// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod
10a6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'drabs skye bo'i gtsug tu 'jog
10a7(rgyud): rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lu
10a8(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad du grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa
10b1(rgyud): cho ga gis po phyag tu chub bkrol bar 'gyur ro// de zar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub po ra rtse bar du yongs su spyong bar bgyid do// de lta bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa
10b2(rgyud): ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na/ khang pa bcags pa legs pa
10b3(rgyud): brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri'i mchog la 'phags pargyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs shing chos ston par blta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs pa
10b4(rgyud): 'akrus te/ gtsang bar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar ro la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dad pa dang / zhe sa dang / bla ma
10b5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs pa ci 'byor pa me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / bos dang / lha ba lbu ba dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bye skye'o/ 
10b6(rgyud): chas brgyan nas chis bcu gsum gyi bcoMm las dkar gsum 'chal bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi dud du na gcig banyid dus gsum du don yod ba'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dpa/ 
10b7(rgyud): tshag gzhan mi sme bar khro bo ba rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ ri mo'i gzugs pa nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o// 
10b8(rgyud): 'tshod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o// ma ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / 
11a1(rgyud): sngags pan skang ce brgyad bzlas brjod pagyis te/ don yod khabs gsum pa nga grags// bdug pa rgyam po blan yod// dang byar 'dun ma gyis ni// sa gsu/ 
11a2(rgyud): kyimod pan po'i 'di/ tan me khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas slo rnams su bdag pa'i phrin chen po lakhrigs pa sa rgyas par 'gyur // dri gnyigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas da c-ing
11a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lce 'phye chen po dang / me dang pa ma yin pa rnams la/ 
11a4(rgyud): chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mched pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis
11a5(rgyud): bcug pa'i dro tshor na de dag thams cad dran song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi sgrib byams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab ma dang / su ke dang tsud pa dang / 'byed par
11a6(rgyud): dad 'khrug pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / ma la ma ngon pa dang / yams kyi nAd dang / gnod pa dang 'tsho ba dang / gdung ba dang / mi 'dab thams cad dang / nAd thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// drung da / 
11a7(rgyud): ser ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sbyin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byad dang g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyong ba thams cad dang / dug dang
11a8(rgyud): dug dang dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bder byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / sgo mnyes dang / gnod sgri ba dang / nad thams cad
11b1(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur zhing / rmi lam ngan pa thams ca da ni bar 'gyur ro// gnod pas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur/ 'gyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi
11b2(rgyud): mchis kyi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyad bar bgyi'o// 'di skar chos bcu bzhi'i nub ma mchis pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa
11b3(rgyud): po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bkye'o// zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
11b4(rgyud): bgyis la/ dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du nA me langs kyi bar mchis nas nyal bar bgyi ste/ rmi lam du dbyig gi mtshon mthong ngam/ bde ba can
11b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ rdzing dang bcas/ gnas dang bcas/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang
11b6(rgyud): bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i chags kyis yongs su bskor cing / khang pa brtsegs pa
11b7(rgyud): na bzhugs la/ sta dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / ska ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
11b8(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das che dpag ma dad yang / rig sngags 'chang dal dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing legs sa zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar
12a1(rgyud): mdzad de/ bye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang ni skyes bu'i byed pa'i ma du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ma ngadu snun pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mar
12a2(rgyud): du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba kang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po rnam par spel ba'i dkyil lajor rgya/ rgya chen po dang / gisang sngags rnam par bya ba'i snying
12a3(rgyud): sgrub pa ni krub zin te/ legs so legs so// khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te/ tshe brjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas
12a4(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zhes phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ 'jig rten
12a5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad stsol cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grubasgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag gnyid sad nas dga' bar bathor ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral/ 
12a6(rgyud): deyongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug brim ze'i gzugs kyis mi dun na mchis par 'gyur shing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// gzugs
12a7(rgyud): mod yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// bya 'o dang rgyal po
12a8(rgyud): dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim pa dag thams cad dpang du 'gyur nang cher mchod par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams las don yod pa'i grub chen po thob par 'gyur ro// gru pa chen
12b1(rgyud): 'abla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas chos bcu bzhil rig mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon dang bcas pa'i
12b2(rgyud): bzod ston sbal bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bkye'o// gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta 'a dang / byang chub sams dpa' la blta ba dang / lharnams la blta bar 'chal ba na/ de'i tshe
12b3(rgyud): 'dug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la zhal ston pa
12b4(rgyud): 'thung zhing / dge ba'am mi dge ba thams cad dam/ nyams pa'am bri ba de thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam che'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// 
12b5(rgyud): de nas kas sngags kyi cho ga dang / bsgrub pa'i don dang las kyi cho ga yar ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad+ma d+ha ra a bo b+ha dza ba de tsu ru tsA ru swA hA/ don yang pa'i rgyal po'i nye ba'i skying
12b6(rgyud): sang sngags so// oM pad+ma bA sha d+ha dz+nyA pa~M/ a mo g+ha bar san cod ya hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnad sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma
12b7(rgyud): 5/ nam mkha' lding dang / me 'am ci dag/ lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / ma ma yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs nas rbab dang yungs kar
12b8(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phyogs bcur gtong thams cad bskul pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// e tra lo kya a thA hA na ya mo g+ha pya sha/ pad bi lo ka ti A An du/ thA ba na
13a1(rgyud): su ra/ su ru su rba/ bi me ma hA/ dgug pa'i gas sngags ten gru grul gyi bdug pa la lan brgyam brgya bzlas pa tshub gyis nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur
13a2(rgyud): gtor bar kyi / khams cad nas dkrug pa dam pa zlab pa lags so//  shA mams gyur rje na thas pa/ ma sa lan stu/ zams // de bzhin gags
13a3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil 'kho thams cad na gnas pa'i lha tshogs la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/ 
13a4(rgyud): ba skye thugs dang / rab dang / me tog dang / rims shing la badrug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te/ khams cad la lan pamacha brgyan pazlas brjod bgyis te/ sems cad spyan drang ba'i rigs/ 
13a5(rgyud): so// oM pang+ge a mo b+h+yo badz+ra a b+hAdz+nyAn/ bArba r+sa du swA hA/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing bste/ cha ba dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad pakyis nas sA la gtor na/ dpag tshad sum brgyas kun
13a6(rgyud): nas 'khor ba'i sa'i danyal 'bar der byin gyis 'arlab par 'gyur ro// de thams cad bsrungs pa na do phra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// dgran pas kyis mi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang / srog 'dren pa
13a7(rgyud): gnod spyan dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ma kha dang / brjed byed dang / ro langs dang / 'dod dgur bstar ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyi ma myong ste/ rnam pa thams cad dum mthong bas
13a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// oM a mob+h+yo pro sha bdo tu meng hA/ san tu Ti sa ri ma ri hU~M/ gdan gyi gsang sngags te lungs kang sa stong rtsa brgyad bslas pa kyis te la la 'ator na/ pang+ga gan
13b1(rgyud): sa khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlab nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po tshe sna brdzun las byas pa'i 'ad+mo'i gdan du rkyen khrim zlams gal lags pang
13b2(rgyud): thal bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod 'i khyis nas gtor te/ rig sngags pa srung pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gas
13b3(rgyud): sngags so// oM ma hA ka ru Na pad+ma a mo g+hA pA sha dr-i D+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+Thi ta b+hu ru b+hu ru b+hAn d+ha re swA hA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 
13b4(rgyud): bsti gnas dang / 'chags dang / phrug dang / dkon pa dang / gnas bsar pa'i phyir dri cha ba dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa kyi gnas gtor bar bgyis te/ gnas su gtog
13b5(rgyud): pa thams cad bsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro// nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas
13b6(rgyud): bsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha pA she na sa man tA da sha su shA se mA ban d+ha ya/ tu ru rba ru hAM/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pal chad sA la/ tshon sna lnga'i snad pas dkris te/ 
13b7(rgyud): lanA stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o// lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs 'ang bkye ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing bar
13b8(rgyud): bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bum par ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha maN+Dal ba na d+ha ya sa man te na/ pad+ma ma hA pad+me d+hu ru d+ha ru swA hA/ dkyil
14a1(rgyud): 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri ra ba dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang sreng du yang gtor
14a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur te/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa dang / 'byung po dang / sha za mchi bar byas pa thams cad kyis mchis
14a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// sems can gdug pa dang / lha 'am/ klu gdug pa gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa
14a4(rgyud): dang / sems ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud+d+he sho d+ha ya sa man+te na/ d+hi ri d+hi ri shud+d+ha satwa ma hA pad+me hUM/ 'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan
14a5(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'am/ byaskye bas sa ma/ tshang tshong ngam/ 'chags 'am/ gnas sam/ tshal
14a6(rgyud): lam/ nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ zangs 'am/ skyabs sam/ khang pa la gtor na stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa 'am/ 'dam rdzab dang / mi gtsang ba dang / 
14a7(rgyud): phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas la sogs te rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// gtsang ba dag par 'gyur ro// gnas gtsang ma
14a8(rgyud): // bdag nyid la dbang bskur na bza' nyes dang / bgo nyes dang / gnod ltas dang / gnod sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// 
14b1(rgyud): gtsang ba gcang par 'gyur ro// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas ma bgyes pa'i bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad bsrung ba dang / bstsal
14b2(rgyud): nga spa ba babyed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / gshe de dang / rgyartsa dang / sras ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / 
14b3(rgyud): sra ba'i slad du/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa thams cad snying du sdug pa dang / mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa
14b4(rgyud): sgrib pa dang / chad pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / mI ngas dang / yams
14b5(rgyud): byin dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyid gcig bzhin bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram/ reg par bgyid na/ rig sngags dang phyag rdza dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim
14b6(rgyud): par dbya ba dang las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der cher mchod par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis mi gazlog par 'gyur ro// 
14b7(rgyud): rkyen gcig bzhin gzhal mad khang rgya chen po bya ba zhing rnam par bkru ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgya
14b8(rgyud): rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// rtag tu gtsang bar spyod pa gtsang ning dag par 'gyur
15a1(rgyud): ro// rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phrag blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabacam
15a2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ad dpag med ni la bdu rtag tu mtho ni she la pas nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams pade bcan du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM bad+his ra sa ra tin+ta tIn+d+ra pa hA a mo d+has
15a3(rgyud): sa.At+ma/ gsang ba chen po'i de mchog shegs sngags so// maM be pu la pad+ma a ma glas rab bag tu/ su rba ku ru mA hA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a ru sha ya me d+hU pad+ma ba n+de
15a4(rgyud): thob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mog+ha patA shi he tu ru Nu ru/ te Sh+Tha badz+ra ban+d+he swA hA/ skye gtsug pacir ba'i gsang sngags so// na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma rda mak+She ba/ b+hai ra d+ha
15a5(rgyud): chub bteg pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pa ka Ta saM b+ha ra bad+ma A sa Ne dza la ma ti/ su ru ku ru hU~M/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// 
15a6(rgyud): lo bad+mo bra sa ra a mo g+ho bi ma le b+ha ra b+ha ra hA hA/ chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a ma g+ha bad+ma su pad+me/ bAn kar d+hi ri d+hi bi ma le swA hA/ lag pa'i gsang sngags
15a7(rgyud): te/ lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang bslab pa'i dgos pa thams cad brtse ste/ sgrub pa thams cad la
15a8(rgyud): sgrub par 'gro ga las thamasacad ma dus thams pad du bye'o// ma lam skabs le ngadu tham pa rten ma sho sa d+har d+hang bim la pa ng+ge blamal de swA hA/  srung ba'i gas 'gas te/ 
15b1(rgyud): pa lan skyong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa bye ste/ kha ba shal la lde'i dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'ang+ka dang / ku lu tra'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro// so dang rkan dang mgul pa yongs su dag par
15b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+han d+ha ba stA mu ru su du pra pU ru dedabya gne d+he pad+mA pra be bA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis kha stsal pa'i ri la tsun dan dang / nas dang / smika dang / ut+pal dang / khur bum dang / gla tsa lhan cig drang
15b3(rgyud): bkres la/ phye ma zhib mor btags nas ri lu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod pa rgyas te/ zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas bad+ma
15b4(rgyud): brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam bsdad pa bgyis na/ rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du the tshom med// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // de bzhin
15b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dgyes// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam
15b6(rgyud): gnyis pa/ bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur bas// don yod rig sngags bla na mod// rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyis pas// dus kun rdul dri spang bar bgyi// mkhris pa pad kan snabs dag dang // de ba2
15b7(rgyud): kun padag myur du ni// kha nas lha y-i gr-ib byung 'gyur// su ma chog dag smras pa ni// den sbyar du dbang du 'gyur// lharnams dbang du mchis pa dang // bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang // na den lha de bzhin du
15b8(rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// 'dag rten sbyang ba bsi ga dang / zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang / sems cad dbang du gyur nas mches// 'don la mung babyed ra/ 
16a1(rgyud): gnas par gyur/ ga ma yin dbyangs 'gyur te// des ba rgyan na rnam pa spang sa/ tshig na stong dkrugs nyam mi 'grum/ rkyen pa bgyis pas su bun dang // lcags
16a2(rgyud): 'khor gnas pa'ang mchis//  kyis bgyis pas gdug pa dang // bshegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po sha ba dang // ye byed 'byung po gas bA pa// thams cad modal
16a3(rgyud): khyer gyur shing // kha thub tu yang 'gyel bar 'gyur// ri mu la na thogs na ni// dus kun du ni mkhas par 'gyud// thub bstar du 'thob 'gyur te// tham sa cad du la tshe ring 'gyur// tshig sman 'angs
16a4(rgyud): shing mnyen par 'gyur// ri lu 'di ni bcang bgyis nas// don yod pad+ma dri ma med// ri lu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma la bi ga te/ pad+ma bi ba re/ san tsar ba tsa ri swA hA/ a mo g+ha sid+d+hi sho d+ha ya
16a5(rgyud): nA ga bus pa'i shun pa dang / yu shir dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma ga sar dang / ye shi dang / kakol dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / bur bum dang / pra bun da rika dang / e la dang / sa ma ka dang / 
16a6(rgyud): yu dang / su gan d+h+r-ig 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyi ste zhib tu btags nas/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas rgyar pa'i chab dang 'bre khas khrus pa kyis shing 'chal pa 'am/ 
16a7(rgyud): chab dron pas khrus bgyis pa'am/ 'tshal bas shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma shin tu dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis par bton pa tsam gyis sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang / gdon kun
16a8(rgyud): 'joms par 'grub pa dang // nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi// mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni// drim kun ni mam nyi sa
16b1(rgyud): dpal kyi ye bzhin du 'bar// bsod na pas phung po rnam par 'phel// gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pa na// lus ni lha yi bzhin du gyur// mi
16b2(rgyud): gtsang ba ni gtsang bar gyur// ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur// tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur// mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang // 
16b3(rgyud): rtag tu thon dam mchis 'gyur// lus la lha yi dri dag 'byung // bad+ma su suM mnyen pa'i lus// sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te// lha ya~M tsan dan dri dag no// mda' tshong gang du som nyi med// rtag tu bde bar1
16b4(rgyud): ba dang // bar bar yang ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung ba dang // lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang // gdug pa'i bgegs rnams mi mthong mi 'gyur// mi bzad dgra rnams kyis kyang
16b5(rgyud): yin// lus nyid sbyang ba bgyis nas su// sngags bzlas brjod pa'i sgrub pa bgyi// legs par sgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa
16b6(rgyud): kun// de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor ga nas pa myur du maNi// ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yis// rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur/ 
16b7(rgyud): thog mar lus sbyar cho ga bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs par spyad// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma lo tsa ni dpe bya rbiSh+Ti pA ri shud+d+he/ su ru su ru pad+ma/ a k+Shi bun bu rus man ta byA ba lo ka ni swAhA/ 
16b8(rgyud): dngos ke tang rgya mtsho sbubs hang // ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di 'gyis la// gisang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
17a1(rgyud): mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis// kun pas bkra shis 'di ni mig nad kun// 'joms par bgyid de g.yang lam
17a2(rgyud): bzang po che// yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par blta// nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gtum po 'joms pa gtum po dang // lhag ma spags
17a3(rgyud): pa bsgomanyes dang // bza' nyes gnod sgrib gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag/ thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu// mi snang bar ni the tsom med// mig gis bzang
17a4(rgyud): mthong ba dang // rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// rna bsrid du rab sbyar bas// lce rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// mig yongs su sbyang ba'o// oM bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha pad+ma a mo gA su
17a5(rgyud): bar ba ra dA swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis gi hang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o// phra po'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod
17a6(rgyud): bkye'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di blangs te dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan cig bgyis pas
17a7(rgyud): dpral ba'i steng na skar mi'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dbang gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung ba gang dag dang // srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid// thams
17a8(rgyud): cad 'jig 'gyur the tsom med// sems can gdug pas gdug pa sams kyang // phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te// mel bye ma la pa bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal ba/ 
17b1(rgyud): skya bos bcas// 'khor bcas rnon por bcas pa dang // blon po che dang mdun na 'don// btsun ma tshogs bcas dbang du gyur// dge sbyong dang ni tham za dang // thams cad dbang du bkra bar 'gyur/ rgyal
17b2(rgyud): r-igs dmangs rigs dag dang ni// mas cad dbang da mche bar 'gyur/ mchod pa chen po'i zhes su 'gyur// rig sngags lnga thams ca dang // gang ltar dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste// de dag thams
17b3(rgyud): cad dang tshig gi// rjes su bslab cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bsrung ba bkyed 'gyur ba// rtag tu sgrub pa bla mde stsol// thig le 'di bgyis grogs med rgyu ba dag/ chos rkun dang ni ches po g.yon// 
17b4(rgyud): can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun nas sbal par 'gyur te som nyi med// song+ge stag dang dom dang ni// glang chen khro bo mi bzad dang // wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang // 
17b5(rgyud): sogadug sbrul kun mgo nas za// gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te// nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ser ba me dang tshig pa dang // char pa mi zad mtshon chu bya/ 
17b6(rgyud): mkhas pa thig ma 'chang ba'i lus// khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur// mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don// thams cad 'di las bgyid par 'gyur// shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang // 'grub par
17b7(rgyud): 'gyur te the tsom med// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag dran par bgyid cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de
17b8(rgyud): mdun du bdag mchis nas/ yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi mchog thams cad de skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// don
18a1(rgyud): yod pa grub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i
18a2(rgyud): pa mo 'o/  pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin pa du/  dge ga sas gan ya ga yis dag gis byam pa /  na
18a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'tshang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis mnongs so// 
18a4(rgyud): rmA dang / phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tsom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM a mo g+hA pA sha d+ha ra sar pra bar hUM/ mtshad phyir thegs pa'i srud pa'i
18a5(rgyud): gsang sngags te// gzhon nums bkal ba'i sbud pa la lan bcwa rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa gyis nas/ mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// oM a mog+ha pra ba ra Na mu ru mu ri dib byab shi kaM/ saM b+hab tu d+ha ra ta ra swA hA/ 
18a6(rgyud): gos kyi gas sngags ste lan nyi shurtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo k+Sha pra wA rjod shi mi bo d+hi ni pad+me swA hA/ gos stegs pa'i gsang sngags te len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// mau ba khyod kas b+huN+Da a ma
18a7(rgyud): 'i d+hi shiH/ sras kyi sngags lan te shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM samr-i ta sa oM b+ha pa mas na/ bdeg cesasad+ha/ reg gi sngags kyi lan nyi shu gcig bzlas so// si mam
18a8(rgyud): ru bdun / bdag bsrung ba ste/ yungs par dang chab la yan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ rang gi sus la dbang bskur ro// oM a mo klas me ya/ ma hA pa d+me ti tiSh+Tha hUM/ dam tshig gi gsangs lnga
18b1(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas so// mas rbad rdza sa ma g+ha ba pa ti tiSh+Tha ra/ tud+d+ha/ slobs dang grogs brgyad pa bsrung ba ste/ thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar theg le bgyi'o// me rje loH pad+ma mA
18b2(rgyud): g+ha pra ma rje me la me ye pA hA/ gom pa 'dor ba'i sngags ta lan nyi shurtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// oM pad+me ma hA pa d+mes ras ra/ pa marten pa be shA ya/ a ma gra pA sha na su ru su ruswA hA
18b3(rgyud): da sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bya'o// oM bi tsing tre a mo g+ha ba ta na na rang ga bi shud+d+ha ya/ kI Ni ka Ni swA hA/ ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// a a mo g+ha shar
18b4(rgyud): thar tha ra swA hA/ mda'i gsang sngags ta lan bdun bzlas so// a bi pra la a mo g+ha ma d+ho d+hAr ba~M shud d+he ser se ra swA hA/ ta babs kyi gsang sngags te la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ 
18b5(rgyud): dag der zhugs na mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro// oM nA nA bi tse tra/ ya me g+ha pus pa/ pa la la tA kin pA ra la par
18b6(rgyud): bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha rad na bi ma Na/ ka Tad tsa a b+hid+hi bid byA g+han do dz+wa la s+pha ra Na/ sam+b+ha na ta naM dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ pog par gyigs
18b7(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas so// oM dzel ba te/ rad na b+ha tA/ si ri NI tu Ti tu Ti s+'ut+ma/ gtor ma'i snod kyigs sdigs te len bdun bzlas so// oM dbe b+ha b+ha tsan e ma ste pad+ma ba re pU rA ya b+hA/ 
18b8(rgyud): dartsegasang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+has pA ra Ni trai Na g+han d+ha pa te ng+ge/ theg pa'i gsang sngags te la na bdun pab zlas so// e sar ne sA ra pa/ as kyi rlung
19a1(rgyud): ni hUM/ rel pa mgrin ring kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM rad na dib bya rad na kuM b+ha ba ti sA gar saM pU ra Ni swA hA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun
19a2(rgyud): bzlas so// oM btsod tro dz+wa la nAn ra g+ha bi b+he ga ta las sho d+ha ya t+yA Ti swAt+ma/ tshan N+ya'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dpe bya a ba le ki Nai bi b+ha dza la trA sa man te nas
19a3(rgyud): swAsAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o// oM nAnA pra hA ra Na a mo g+ha mud tA dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so// oM
19a4(rgyud): kA rAd na s+yArba d+hi ki Ni ki Ni swA hU~M/ zag sdud kyi gsung thugs te lan brgya rtsa brgyad pargyas 'jod 'gyes te kyil lakhor ngam rim bris pa'i dmas sa/ gzhan gzhi gang yang rung bal gad ba par
19a5(rgyud): mi'i drul bar bra be sha la/ a ma s+t+rai pad+ma d+h+waM/ sgo'i cha dbye ba ste skor re lang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM su ba thA ga ti prapu ma ng+ga la dA ra ba ban ti/ oM dpe bya bA dzan/ a mo g+ha pA shan ba na ba re/ 
19a6(rgyud): hUM/ mos ma thun/ rA bya sa kyi ni/ a mo g+ha pa t+tA rAH/ lan bdun bzlas par 'gyi'o// oM ba~M bid+ha d+hapad+hA ro pa kar// tsal tsal/ a mo g+ha ba ti bA d+ha/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// 
19a7(rgyud): byA g+h+nAn d+ha nu sar ni a mo g+ha ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ mched yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM g+han+ta s+pha ra ni sa man ta/ a mo g+ha pra pUr hUM/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun
19a8(rgyud): go// oM ni ram la kA la sho ni rib phyagan d+ha bla pUr la ni pAr byatrUM/ byug pa'i gsang sngags tes na bdun bzlas sa// oM b+han d+ha tsUta pra pUr na/ kuru tsu rus hA/ dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags tes
19b1(rgyud): bdun bzlas so// os man tan/ bi ma la gan d+hod ta re swA hA/ bskul ba'i gsang lhags te lan bdun bzlas so// yod pa bya ldan d+ha pra b+hA ra ni swA gar dza la deb b+ha a s+thin+ti ti ka la sho dar pUHm+WA ra ya/ 
19b2(rgyud): nga la sad+ha Ata/ bus pa'i dri ba kyigs sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyan bzlas so// me ras sa grub te/ sarba bi d+ha ya d+h+r-i ti sa pU ra ya tra~M/ gtsor ma ro tshogs can gyi gis sngags te lan te sa pa / 
19b3(rgyud): bzlas so// mi dab bya b+ho da na/ sa ma pU ra yA/ bi bu la pra be swA hA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dzAM shu kra b+ho do na pa li bi pU lar sA gra ba ti su ra pra sur d+h+waM/ zas dkar gtsu
19b4(rgyud): kyi gtor ma 'am/ gzhan yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM ba la ba ti swA rab tid dbya sa naswa ti/ tar tAr tu ni nA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM da ku du su mod pa lanan
19b5(rgyud): pud+ya thA ba ra Sha ni b+hA ba swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha la ta puSh+Ta pa kun tsi ta pa na s+pho ti a ha ra saM prAr+Nakum b+he swA hA/ me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas
19b6(rgyud): so// oM ma drA d+hU ba me g+na pa Ta la sa na tsad ya/ sa man te na hUM swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brlas so// oM a thar pa ni dz+wa la dz+wa la de mu khe swA hA/ me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas
19b7(rgyud): ga/ mas pa/ kAn no sa grug sa//  brtan pa'i gas sngags kyil ni 'dun pa rnam sa tsug ma las/  ste/ mams 1/ 
19b8(rgyud): sbyig tu/ sa pa stor cig sa rdzogs te la na te cag cin pags na/ nga yod tarten ra bdas 'an ma da na tsha ma gror ni sa tu/ phyag brtse ba'i gas sngags tel na/ 
20a1(rgyud): rdzam /  gdag dun tha / 'ag sa na so// ma uH sa rmArmA / 
20a2(rgyud): sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM di bya a mo b+ha ba pu la swa re ma d+hu ra ner g+ha Sha ru te na ra Na ra NA ra hUM/ dril bu'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shurtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na
20a3(rgyud): brgyad do// ma shA~M las ba rnam sa pa zlas pa mad+ha ma Ni ra dA ni sh+tsa She swA hU~M/ par mthigasang sngags te lan brgya brgyad bzlas so// yon tu du pA Sh+Ta shrI da hU~M/ 
20a4(rgyud): gsang sngags te gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM duSh+Ta sa do bi bo d+ha ni/ sa ma sa ma ya ba re swA hA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bezlas so// oM
20a5(rgyud): ma ni bi pu la pra bar ta na trAM/ bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te lanA brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM bi tsid tra rad no dz+wa lo 'di bya/ gu sum pa re puSh+ka ra te swA hA/ me trog phreng ba'i gas sngags
20a6(rgyud): lan bdun bzlam so// mau pa byal ca ne a mod+hatha ba re/ sarbad bya a b+hi te/ sid+d+he shud+d+ha bi lo ga ti swAhA/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te la na nyi shu cu gcig bzlas so// oM a
20a7(rgyud): sa man+ta shu ba ne ta ra ta ra gats+tsha swa b+hA ba na ma swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu ca gcig bzlas so// oM di bya sa ma pU ra Ni nA ga be lo ki na hUM/ mkhar bas
20a8(rgyud): kyigasang sngags te lan nyi shu ci gcig bzlas so// oM pad dza skAr ni s+phA ra la/ a mo b+ha ba te sa man+ta pra be swAH/ srung bzed kyi gsang sngags te len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlam so// 
20b1(rgyud): 'di rgyam na ta zas ras dasur/ po khA dza ta swAH/ 6gdang ba' gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shun gcig bzlas so// oM dz+wal dus dzAm ga khyer bla gar thAs d+ha/ sbyin drag gi gas sa
20b2(rgyud): tel na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad+me ni pad+mas ne bar pra ba ra nA ga b+ha ba ne swA hA/ 'bab na dang mtsha'i gsung sngags ta la na bdun bzlas so// oM kha ga tsar ni/ gam gro ma ye pA br-i dzin
20b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// os rbad tre a mog d+hi/ She ka ma hA rA rba bi ma le a g+ho Ta tum+mu/ pra ba pa Ni b+hU dza pang+ga dzas hA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags tu la
20b4(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ma sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ce lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas/ cho ga bsgrubs pa na dgos pa
20b5(rgyud): na tha'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang / nor bum tshogs pa'i gagal med khang rgya chen po 'byung ba
20b6(rgyud): / lha'i me tog dang / gdugs dang / bdan sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang / ro sna tshogs pa'i mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gtor ma bzang po
20b7(rgyud): pa bsna tshogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ci lta ba de lta bu dang
20b8(rgyud): byung bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//  rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am can
21a1(rgyud): / dang na chen po rnams mas pa'i gsus ba des bu dag 'byung ba gyur ro// marnams kyi yang cal ba dang / khams la can tha dag 'byu ba
21a2(rgyud): ro// de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ci skad gsungs pa chog shib med ga/ chog dang gsang sngags bsgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'a
21a3(rgyud): grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su grub par bgyis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngag
21a4(rgyud): 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur
21a5(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga gi ba mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i nags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par tha
21a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// khon nyid yang dag pa sgrub pa'i grub pas
21a7(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i shags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i gru ba pa chen po stsol bar brgya'o// shin tu rgya che shing bag tshab ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang bku
21a8(rgyud): chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal par bgyi'o// 'di la yade gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing / dngos pa
21b1(rgyud): du lidi med la mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / steng rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang stsolas gyis brtse ba las chog tu brtsod par bkyi'o// chu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du
21b2(rgyud): rab thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// bden par smra ba dang / bden pa la dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas/ don yod pa'i gags pa
21b3(rgyud): nga po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzlas par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs
21b4(rgyud): parnams yid la bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas yid la rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzi
21b5(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas/ mngon sum du mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtsa'i gdang ba bti
21b6(rgyud): sde mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ gzhan mo smra bar bzlas par babyes te/ 'di ni gsang ba'i de lan nyid bsgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par rabakyi ni/ bdag la don yod pa
21b7(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid 'grub par gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa/ sems dag pa lag na pad+ma can sems can thams cad la byams pa' bdag
21b8(rgyud): sem pa rlams pas/ phyogs bcu 'de bzhin gshegs kan dang / lha dang klu nga gnod sbyin dang // srin pa sa mni ga sang ba pa// 'dig rten byung dang cangs par/ 
22a1(rgyud): khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs// gshin rje chu kya lus pa dang tu nga sro sogs dang de bzhin du// pra nye kun babyed gzhon nu dang // de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dag/ phyag rgya bcings da / 
22a2(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur// grol ma 'dun ni 'du bar 'gyur zhe bzhin pa rol phyin bcu dag/ mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can// de bzhin pad+ma gar dgyir bangadra// rgyal dang rnam
22a3(rgyud): tsa mon// 'phrog ma 'byung po'i mdag dang // de bzhin lagan rdo bcwa// mthu men de bzhin reg 'dzin dbang // rdo rje 'chang can de bzhin du// bcu gsum lha dbang ldan cig dang // sum cuganyis nas / 
22a4(rgyud): dag ni// gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do// de'i mod
22a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mgon po'i phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan stong phyag song dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs pa/ 
22a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya ba cings pa tsam gyis ni// zam ze'i cha lugs don yod zhugs// mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med// mgron sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin
22a7(rgyud): mtsho'i klong dang ni// mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dang // de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa bsam ma khyab// rnam
22b1(rgyud): tsanam gzugs dang ni// sgyum lta thun tir re 'dzin// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni zhamagon po thams cad ston par mdzad// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od
22b2(rgyud): med// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba// mgon po mad la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas slong gi zhing dag ni// chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
22b3(rgyud): bye ba brgya phrag stong // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mag na// phyag rgya bcings btsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthang ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste// nyi
22b4(rgyud): gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor long bzhin do rje'i gdag// de dag zi lam snang ba mthang 'gyur bar// de la yid gnyis som nyi tho tsam med/ sangs rgyas rnams
22b5(rgyud): zung ba'am mtshams med lnga// mgon pa mal gdug sems nyid dang ni byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'bigs pa la// ma bar ba dang dam chos 'bru ba dang // rgyal bas gsungs ste
22b6(rgyud): mnar med gzhol pa dang / ma ba dmyal ba bcu ga gnas pa dang / bskal pa 'bram po thams cad gad cig thal// phyag cugs sngags bzlas pa tsam byas sam// thol lam sa
22b7(rgyud): da me ni gsang gas // ga pa kun 'dun sa pa nyi med/ don nags stong ba'i phyag tu mamang ba yang / du na gyi na dang ma tshungs te ltung bar pags// 
22b8(rgyud): thag stod de dag gi// byeb pa skyes dani mi ma ming bar 'gyur/ byang chub sred par btags pa'i thams cad dang / chas kyi 'khar ma rabatu mnar bar mtshungs// don yang rgyal ba'i zhing po
23a1(rgyud): t+ya dang // gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams phung chen gyi// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// de yi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de ni dpag
23a2(rgyud): pa som nyi pad// de nas rig sngags 'char ba gsang gyur nas// gcar ma'i gos bskos nas ri thog sar yang // ye byad bsgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang // rtag tu yan lag
23a3(rgyud): tshogs dang // sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdug bkyis zhing // dpung ba lag pa lha le sbom gyi khrug/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gdan bshams par// skyil mo krung bcas na
23a4(rgyud): byams sems dang // snying rje'i lhag pas ma de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyog bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma
23a5(rgyud): bachod cing chos la brtson// shin tu rig pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar// shin tu reg pas bsrung ba'i cho ga bgyi// shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus// bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang / sem
23a6(rgyud): can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid car// lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni// phyag rgya 'di bcing bar rabagyi ste// lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te/ 
23a7(rgyud): nga zla ba'i tshul du snying kar gzhag go// phyag rgya 'den don 'ad pa'i rgyam ze mang ma che ba'i phyag rgya ste/ byang chub snyisteng pa'i bar du stsol bar brtse/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug
23a8(rgyud): kasang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a ma k+ta pe sur bi ta/ sa man+da ma ma lo ga ya man sI ya dA ya swA ti ma ma g+ha pad+me/ tsar ba tser/ san car du d+h+r-i/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam pas su bden
23b1(rgyud): rgyal po pad+ma 'bar ba'i gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal po ma shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher ga yos par
23b2(rgyud): gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyam bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dad ga
23b3(rgyud): da rab tu dkyis shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos phyag gser gyi khadog lta bu brgyan nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi skye bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam
23b4(rgyud): na gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lho dang / lus ngan dang / rkyang
23b5(rgyud): dang / kun 'byed gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams bsrung ba dang / stob pa dang / sred par bgyid par 'gyur ro// byin rgya bcings po tsam kyi mad la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / darigs pa ban+d+ha
23b6(rgyud): pa/ chad pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad pagyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so// don yod dam
23b7(rgyud): chog mchog gags pa// pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgyab cing // mdzub mo gung rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/ sems ma mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te/ rnam par grol ba'i
23b8(rgyud): 'khor che ba'i phyag rgya mngon pa'i gsung sngags pade 'arjod// yi ma b+ha dre su mas can lan/ thad+d+ha br-i ta/ d+har dang/ dra 'bru/ byan rgyab cings tab ci sa ma zag tu'am/ bzlas pa ma
24a1(rgyud): dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes brdzib stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang / mnyes
24a2(rgyud): dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhig/ rig sngags 'char la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying mo grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang du mthong
24a3(rgyud): rol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshig grub pa snol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
24a4(rgyud): ba mo phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
24a5(rgyud): gagasang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa
24a6(rgyud): blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil pad+ma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing / mthe chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma 'chang la bdug pa dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang
24a7(rgyud): dA stug pa phyes dang // bdan gos dang rgyan dang ni// gtor ma mtshad yon rab tu phul// bram bya gang ba'i dris gas dang / chen spyad lnga lnga tshan dbye'o// zhan yang masbyin sngo gas la/ !9
24a8(rgyud): deni kun la mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// thams cad du na don yod mchog/ go bar bgyi ba'i phyag rgya 'di// pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlab// phung mo nor bus dkris pa la bu'i
24b1(rgyud): dag ba med pa'i bshA napa 'i byag rgya la nas te/ 'di ni zug pa dam pa mnas so// spyan dang ba'igs sngags te/ yos po /  A ma d+has rgyalal kyi d+ha pa Na le/ bi ri be de 'i bad+ma thung na / 
24b2(rgyud): dung gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te// byang chul sems dpa' thams cad dang // phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab dgug/ lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil la
24b3(rgyud): nilha rnams dkrug/ ba tu 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' 'a // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri kA l+h+wa ma ni de bzhin du// nam mkha' ldi dang
24b4(rgyud): mi'am ci// sto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste// de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing // srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag la lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad+ma'i mtsham
24b5(rgyud): su bya ste// gung mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni// grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang // dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyis pa yi// bsrung ba'i las la ba ga
24b6(rgyud): med// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang // gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu// mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // bsrung ba'i las
24b7(rgyud): ni bgyis par 'gyur// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dr-i D+ha pad+ma ban d+ha sa san ta shan tu mAn/ tsu ru tsa ru hU~M phaT/ de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// thub ldan sems can kun sman// don yod pa yi phyug
24b8(rgyud): khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor pa rnams mnyam par bzhag te/ srin lag kha gdangs la ser mo rnams yid tsam bsdus pa ni// don yod
25a1(rgyud): tshogs rgyal po yi// pad+ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags// phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang // 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun
25a2(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni gzung tsam dang // gsang sngags dam pas bsrungs bgyis nas// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus gsu ma gshegs pa rnam thar ba'o// dkyil 'khor dam
25a3(rgyud): grub par 'gyur// oM badz+re badz+ra/ a d+hiSh+Thi te pad+me bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra nAM/ pra be sha tus tre yang d+ha ga dan d+hi ri tu Ti swA hA// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi/ 
25a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gde ni rnam drug du// g.yo bar 'gyur ba som nyi med// phyag na pad+ma'i lus 'bar nas// mgub chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu
25a5(rgyud): zhing mdun na mchis// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang // mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum cu rtsa gsum
25a6(rgyud): sbro// gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do// de can 'jig rten khams dag ni// sgron gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// gnas kun tu ni 'dug par 'gyur// phyag
25a7(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'phrog/ nye ba'i sngon mongs thams cad 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las
25a8(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thams cad 'jig par byed// dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur// mi bzad 'jigs las bsgra
25b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'drin mthong tsam gyis// mtshams med lda ni bkres pa dang // sdug pa kun las rnam par thar// sems can kun las rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin gshegs kun byin
25b2(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/ 
25b3(rgyud): gis bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i srid du/ gis sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// oM ma mo g+ha pad+ma ngal ba sho pa hUM/ zin po rim la ny+dzaH// DAg tu skye bor bshaganas
25b4(rgyud): dag gis bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags 'dri/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su// phyag rgya gsang sngags ngogs med pas// rtag tu 'akrus pa'i mod tsam gyis// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar la
25b5(rgyud): mig cid da pa gtsang ba sa/ sa spyod ma yin sa //  zla par gyur// bsod rnams zu na 'a//  / na
25b6(rgyud): sdug/ gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub// grub pa don yod nags pa yi// don yod de nyid grub par 'gyur// lha rnams kun na 'du 'gyur te// bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// mgon pa 'phags
25b7(rgyud): ras gzigs// sems pa mchog sprin dag pa po// mchog sbyin rgyun tu thams cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad
25b8(rgyud): las 'grub ste// gnon pa kun lal rnam par thal// TIg sa ni las rnam par ma/ thams cad du ni bkrags mchog/ khrus kyi rnam pa 'didag ni// don yad tshul gyi mchos yin no// 
26a1(rgyud): bsdams la 'og tu bstan// srin lag gnyis yud tsam bskum pa ni pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag/ phyag rgya teng 'dzin lta bu 'di// skyil mo krung bca
26a2(rgyud): chis nas su// phyag rdza di dag bcing bgyi zhing // mnyam par bzhag nas gisang sngags bzlag// bcings pa tsam gyi med nas ni// skyil krung ngo ldan mnyam 'gyur// kun nas gcar gyur nas ni/ 
26a3(rgyud): gegs dang lag 'dren thams cad dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas// lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu// de dag thams cad rkyang nga
26a4(rgyud): 'bros// bgegs med par ni las 'grub pas// bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dr-i D+ha pad+me shA ra hUM/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas/ mthe
26a5(rgyud): pad+ma ba phye ba ltar bzhes te/ don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya ba cing bar bgyi'o// oM pad+me shAr
26a6(rgyud): a mo g+ha ba rad+ha/ be ri bi ri swA hA/ 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems dpa'i sa
26a7(rgyud): partsa gcig tu bzlas brjod brdzi'o// lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong ga ng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam par ga
26a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur shing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'chang dal legs sa zhes bgyi sa stsal bar 'gyur ra// dbugs 'thun
26b1(rgyud): par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna chags gtong ba mdzad do// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par
26b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang
26b3(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// 
26b4(rgyud): ka rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal ba na snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod bcu rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgyabatu
26b5(rgyud): rgyad bcings nas/ zhag gcig sbyar ba bgyis te bzlas brjod payis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun na mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang sa legs pa
26b6(rgyud): sa pa kyi bstsol te/ rig sngags 'tshang legs su lags so// 'dri ni bzlas parjod rtsi dam pa yin no// nas dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rag sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bcaganas/ dbun
26b7(rgyud): sbyi ba ma da tshur shog pu/ gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no// co rjes su bzung shing byin gyis brlabs pas/ nga'i bu rig sngags 'cha ga rgya bor gyur cig/ rig sngags 'chang pyod
26b8(rgyud): pa'i shags pa'i sked pa grub pas/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'kho gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang / cho ga ni ba mo'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig/ snying rje chen pa sems kyis sems
27a1(rgyud): thams cad la goms par kyis shig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i bangal du gnas nas she' phos te bajig rten gyi khams bad pa can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhis khyod bad+ma'i nang
27a2(rgyud): skyes nas/ brgyan thams ca kyis brtan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rag brgyan pa/ byang chub kyi snyid po'i A thug gi pa yon pag tu me par 'gyur ro// 'di rdzu dag gzhan
27a3(rgyud): bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshad na nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor pos
27a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rig ljags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// don du cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'bru
27a5(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpung pa bskul ba pas brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi shing slar rjod par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod pa
27a6(rgyud): bgyis la phyag rgya brgya snyeng bcings na tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pastan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgra ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pang don yod pa'i mig
27a7(rgyud): su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / drag po dang / dbang po dang / ma dpa/ zla ba dang / gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / 
27a8(rgyud): nal sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du 'khor bar 'gyur ro// ci lha ci ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de
27b1(rgyud): lA bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'ji ba rten pa'i bzlas d+mo smrab pa 'phrul lags so// 'bus pa zlas pas 'jig rten las bdas pa phyogs brgya'isargya rgyas kyi zhing thalas spyad na/ 
27b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang bar mthong bar 'gyur ro// de na gshegs pa thams can las grang
