27b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings te sprul ma srung bcas nas/ sems can thams cadan la che ba dang / bsrung ba sams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyi rang
27b4(rgyud): bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas brjod pa kyi'o// bzlas brjod pakyis ma thag lo nang lan drug brgya bzhi bcur 'azlas pa rjod brtsis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
27b5(rgyud): cad dbugs 'byin pa mdzad cing / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do// bzlas brjod bgyis patsam dukyi 'das pa rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
27b6(rgyud): riba'i sgra gzugs de las yang 'od zer 'byung byar 'gyur ro// 'phag sab ska ral gzigs dbang phyug langs su dag pa'i bdag nyid mi la ladu 'azang byar gyur ro// mchog thams cad sdom
27b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sdob pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad sbyangs par 'gyur
27b8(rgyud): drug rten pas dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod pa bshegs pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyab po// 
28a1(rgyud): rnam pa gsum pa/ thal ma lon cig bsdams te sa/ khyim yi na lagag/ bya kyang cigate sngags 'di brjed
28a2(rgyud): bla tA ra pa ng+ge/ a mo g+ha sad+d+hi hU~M// phyag rgya 'di ni don med napab// las rnams grub dang ldan pa sa// 'di de brjed pa bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur du 'grub par 'byug/ 
28a3(rgyud): dka' don yod grub pa mcheg// mchog kun rab tu stobs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pade bzhin 'jig rten pa// sleb pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol// bsod nams phung po dgan
28a4(rgyud): 'phel// 'akra shis s+tha ni 'byung bar 'gyung ba'o// lha rnams rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur//  rje bcings pa shin tu bcing // rtag tu sems ni brtan por lagyi// mdzub mo dag ni yid bsdams nas/ 
28a5(rgyud): po dag ni rab tu brkyang // don yod pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag bya dang // snying po gsungs pa dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug ga phyag rgya las dang don thams cad 'grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag tham
28a6(rgyud): gsungs nas/ de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo yA hr-i da la/ pad+ma dra d+ha ba tun rab lA ma Na dz+wa la bying ba dz+ra/ snying po phyag rgya 'di ni 'acings pa lis// bad+ma 'chang ba'i don yos
28a7(rgyud): // grub pa de nyid yang dag sam nya med// thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/ da ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzung // shin tu gsang ba'i gas
28a8(rgyud): zlas// shin tu bkru bas gos gcer gyon// gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bkyed cing // sems can kun la brtse gyur nas// rtag tu bla ma gus par bsgom// rtag tu shin tu dngab kyi zhing // 
28b1(rgyud): ka sa nal 9 9// b+hU du las 'grus ltar dun// bcwa chang dang stsang rgyas 'phrul ltang du gtan dbang phyug 'phob// blar dusems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yan pa
28b2(rgyud): kyi pa na tshul du phyin ga la lag pa bskud nas/ mdzub po byed du bskyeng man ci yang seMs 'jug pa log pa g.yas pa'arang ste/ song ma rnams padra tshul du bzhag la/ 
28b3(rgyud): ma bkug ste/ kung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni/ don yod pa'i zhi ba chen po'i mig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags
28b4(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM pa shu ba ti pA na d+ha ra sa hA swar shrI pra ti mAn di ta kA ya/ A kad 'a de san cod ni/ pU dra d+hu ru/ a ma g+ha pA sha sid d+hi hUM/ phyag rgya des gsang sngags lan nye shu
28b5(rgyud): gcig bzlas so// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bkrus nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bdag cing slar yang rangag gnas su gzung zhing // gsang sngags
28b6(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas te/ lan bdun du yang brdeg go// don yong rgyal po bzlas pas ni// bsam pa mchog tu dga' bas 'akye// bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la ni// don cher zhags pa'i phyag rgya la // 
28b7(rgyud): byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang // mong bas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag/ ci ltar yang la bsams pa bzhin// mdo la grub pa bla med dang // modo la zam
28b8(rgyud): rbad dgug par 'gyur// lce dang klu dang gnad sbed dang // dra ba ska man nam mkha' ldeng// me 'am ci dang lta phyache// rege sngags 'chang la lta ba'i phyir// thams cad de yi mod la 'dra// phyogs
29a1(rgyud): dacu' sangs rgyas thams 'ad gra/  nyid gzigs pa pa gzugs par 'gyupa// dag sngag pa 'chang sa phyag phyir// byang chub sams dpasal dub ga// pa nanam
29a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// mchog sbyin skye bong phyag 'jog 'gyur// yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi// rang bzhin mod la ston par mdzad// gang dag mnar med ming ba dang // thams can
29a3(rgyud): mtshams med lnga 'gyid dang // gang dag 'phags la srung 'debs dang // gang dag dam chos spong ba dang // phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin 'jug gam// bcings pas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig
29a4(rgyud): modo la 'dren pa mthong // phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang // rjes su zlos par bgyid pa dang // rig sngags 'chang ba
29a5(rgyud): bde// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon du mthong bar smra bar bya// tshe rabs brgyad par bskal pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi// sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams// phyag rgya
29a6(rgyud): sam mthong tsam gyis// de kun 'byur 'gyur som nye med// thal mo ldan cig dam par sbyar te// mkhas pas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis la/ mdzub mo nor bur bkyil te gung mo ya dzam+ba zhig sa sug
29a7(rgyud): ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste lag pa spyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM s+t+rai ya d+hA nu ga ta/ a b+hi Shiny+tse du/ sar
29a8(rgyud): / sa s+ye She gi pad+ma ma Ni swa pa d+me/ a mo g+ha sarba ta thA ga ta/ yat+pad+d+hoteb+h+rUM/ 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis/ rig sngags 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems cad kyis dbang bsrung
29b1(rgyud): gyur ro// phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag/ gis dbang bskur par 'gyur ro// dag sngags 'cha ga bya ba byed pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'gru
29b2(rgyud): gyur ro// nyon mongs po'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pu'i gnas su 'gyur ro// spyi gtsug rdo rje'i pad+ma bcing // rtag tu sor mo'i rtsam
29b3(rgyud): mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi'o// rang gi gdong gi khro gnyer bzhin// khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste// las kun sgrub par bgyid pa yi// thams cad sgrub byed phyag rgya ste// kun sgrub dam pa'i
29b4(rgyud): sngags pas// 'di dran sgrub pa kun gyi mchog/ oM kro d+ha dA dzA d+ha ma hA/ a mo g+hahA na ta na/ san du dAn hU~M/ phyag rgya 'ad dran tsam gyis kyang // mthu chen po la gsang ljags kyis// gdug pa kun ni/ 
29b5(rgyud): 'jig ste// ri rab kyang ni bsnyil bar bgyid// phyag rgya bceng ba bgyis pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// sems can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu// bgegs dang log 'dren gdug pa
29b6(rgyud): de dag thams cad zhi bar 'bras/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// thams car dbang du gyur nas mchis// lha dang me da dge sbyong dag/ bram pa rgyal rigs yang lags pa// thams cad dab du gyu na
29b7(rgyud): de// mchis par 'gyur ba somanye med// rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam gzhag la// mthe bo mnyam du bte gnas ni// gung mo yi ni gung sa nyid// yin tsam bzhug nas bskyed par bgyi// 'di ni pad+ma chen po la/ 
29b8(rgyud): ba la de rgyag rgya ste// thub pa bla na med pa yi// thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal ma pa d+ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bo nyid ni brkyang bgyis la// ma chu yid ces bzhug pa na// dkar shes chen mo'i bya
30a1(rgyud): // 'dun kun grus blan med// dongo la tshul du na la spyad dam bcings shig/ shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsla sa khas nya bzhin na da na rnas
30a2(rgyud): sbyin// lag pa gnyis ci zhal sbyang brgyang nas ni// gas pa nga shAng gung ma bskas nas re// mame rung ba rkyang nas lcags smrag bad+ma'o// tshul du snying gale gnas su gzhag par dbyed/ byab byang
30a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad 'tshongs shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis 'azung la gyid somanye med// phyag rgya
30a4(rgyud): bsheg nas lag pa ni// thal pa pad+ma'i tshul bzhin lags byas te// snying gar gzhag pa sdod sbyin po nya mo'o// 'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags// dang por rdo rje khu tshur legs paH
30a5(rgyud): gung po lhag sa bsum zhing mthe bong gzhag/ bad+ma tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol 'dun gyi// grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di// sdug pa thams cad 'arig cing nyon mongs kun// nad kun nye bar ni
30a6(rgyud): nyi med// don yod pa yi grub pa bla med kye// tsha gzhab mo thams cad rang tu 'grub// lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma bcing // mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas na/ 
30a7(rgyud): bo yang ni dgug par bgyi// 'di ni rtamagrin phyag rgya ste// cho ga zhib po'i pad+ma lags// mad+mo tshul du bal mo sbyar// mdzub sos 'khyud la bud mon// lcags kyu'i tshul du bsteng 'a
30a8(rgyud): 'iklong ki kha lta bu// rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs// 'di ni las kun bgyid pa po// grub pa kun ni bla na med// phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'am
30b1(rgyud): sngags sgrog lhag ma bkug nas pad+ma tshul// b+hang ga'i gnas su gzhag pa mgrin sngon gyi// 'di na dayos med las kyad phyag cha lags// lag gnyis pa dang pra tra ti/ gams g.yo
30b2(rgyud): dpe' gnas su// kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du gzhag/ byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyis pa de// zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste// de bzhin kun gyis ma thub pa'o// mthu bo mnyam
30b3(rgyud): mnyam 'gyis la// sor mo'i rtse mo bskums pa dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul// rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i tshul du mdzub po
30b4(rgyud): bskum// g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms// lcags sgrog ra pa du bgyes nas ni// lag pa gnyis pa brkyang nas kyang // snying gar gzhag pa'i
30b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ste// 'di ni rgyun du gshin rje lags// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// sor mo sber ba'i thor zo dgug/ g.yas pa snying gar bzhag nas su// mthe ba dang ni mthe chung dang
30b6(rgyud): sngags rnams ni brgyad bgyis te// 'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste// klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lags so// lag pa gnyis ni bsdams 'gyis la// song po phying kha log tu sbrel// g.yas
30b7(rgyud): dang ni g.yon pa dag/ snying ga'i gnas su bzhag pa gyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi// gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyi// lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang // mthe bo mdzub mo dkug
30b8(rgyud): / ag pa g.yon pa brgyan nas su// ma dzub mo kyan du bsla ba ni// 'di na tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad du ni las sgrub pa'o// phyag rgya de nyid g.yas pa la// ba'i nur sor ma
31a1(rgyud): bgyis te// dang srang tshogs kyi phyag kyang de// sgra rnams kun gyis phyag bac+doMs pa'o// lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings pa// ka sdug 'khor ma'i phyag rgya ste// ska man thams
31a2(rgyud): cad 'azhugs pa yi// bya ba 'jug phyag rgya 'de zhes gsungs// g.yas pa pi dbu rang bkyi// g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi// mthe bo mthe chung bsdum pa ni// 'byung po thams
31a3(rgyud): bgyid pa// 'di ni drug po'i phyag rgyar gsungs// g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas su// mdzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// dkur bsten khu tshur bcangs nas gzhag/ sor mo rnams nas
31a4(rgyud): bar bgyi// drag po rgyun du lta bgyid pa// de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi// gzhon du phyag rgya 'di ses gsungs// rkyen du lag pa gnyis brgyad nas// song mo gsum ni brgyad bgyid de// mdza
31a5(rgyud): mdzub mo bkug pa ni// 'od zer stong dag 'gro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid song mo gsum// bkug nas sor mo gnyis gnyis brgyad// ska ma'i tshogs kyis padzes bya
31a6(rgyud): pa// 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun grub pa bsgrub par bgyid// sdig pa thams cad spong zhing nyon mongs kun// nyabs pa
31a7(rgyud): bgyid cir sgrib pa thams cad 'byung// lus kun zad par byed cing don yod pa'i// las smra ba don yad grub pa 'grub par 'gyur// oM pad+ma tar ta dA la/ 'drat+ka daM hU~M/ oM ma pA pad+me shA ke/ 
31a8(rgyud): d+yAd+yA hA/ oM T+Ti shwa nI pad+ma ta rat+na ts+tsha/ oM bad+ma pa Na Da da bA sa da~M/ kur Na kun Na swA hA/ oM ma mo g+ha pad+ma ba re ta sid d+h+ya sid d+ha hu~M hU~M/ oM sarba nga ga ma no a hA la ro dr-i Ni hUM/ oM a mo d+han
31b1(rgyud): A drA/ oM dul dul pan+d+ha a mon+ta t+te/ o ma su kha di krid rnam sa na hU~M/ oM badz+ra la kAn du shang d+har d+ha run/ sa pa bad ne b+ha si ta thA sa ya d+g+ha/ oM pan+de shA ris t+ta n+tu/ ma
31b2(rgyud): oMlbA shI'i hUM/ oM sa ma ra ta ra d+ha ra d+hI/ oM la~M k+sha de ba si chu ru mu ru hU~M/ oM sa mo steb tA dad+ha hU~M/ ma~M ni da bang du sa sa~MN+Dab+hu trAM/ oM a mo b+ha d+da dped+ma naH/ sangs pas man+ta b+hu tra~M hAH/ 
31b3(rgyud): oM su du dri me li li li swA hA/ mi shig ti sbyangs so rna ba ti nA rA/ oMs sa gas DU t+ye swA hA/ i sos ba h+ne trA~M/ de bzhi'i phyag phyags sngags gsungs pa yang // phyog bya
31b4(rgyud): sngags tha dad sgrub// gsang sngags 'chang gis ci skad gsungs pa'i las// rtag tu kun brtsed mdonan thams cad bgyid// gtsang ma spyod pa gtsang ma dag/ legs bkrus gcer ma'i gos 'gos
31b5(rgyud): nas/ dre zhim dri yis dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag byugs nas su// phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang // gsang sngag
31b6(rgyud): bzlas pa'i mad pa ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'thum// phyag rgya dag ne bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgya
31b7(rgyud): ngachub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// sa thams cad kyis legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pa
31b8(rgyud): skar po// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i chag rim par bya ba pa tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tha dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 
32a1(rgyud): don yod pa'i rig sngags 'gru' par 'gyur ro// tshag btsan par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros 'ag cha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// blo gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phag
32a2(rgyud): bstan ras gzugs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad pa rtag tu sa 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dam pa sum bar 'gyur ro// rtag tunag dpapas te rdol ba dang / mi mdzar ba dang gdug pa dang / 
32a3(rgyud): rab tu gdug pa thams cad pham par bgyes par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / rahrung po dang / sha ba dang / bgegs dang / lag
32a4(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa
32a5(rgyud): thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/ tshe ring por 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las/ 
32a6(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur ro// ston gyi drim dang / se sna dang / phrag dog thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// legs par dran zhib bus shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'a ba'i dus kyi mong
32a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams can gyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyed
32a8(rgyud): rten gyi khams bde ba can du songs shig ces shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i blo thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro// ngan song gi 'gro ba
32b1(rgyud): / cad las yongs su grol bar gyur ro// 'ad nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du bya bar ma 'gyur ba/ skye ba na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// thams cad du bad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi ske
32b2(rgyud): lathug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi shing nam sangs rgyas kyi shing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'dzag tan dbang phyug stsal pa ye// phyag rgya'i rtaklas ni brjod par bgyi// u gang la na'i tshad dag gis// dkyil
32b3(rgyud): 'khor snyam pa bri ba brtse// gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis// dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur// ldeg pa kun las grol ba dang // de nyid dag ni grub par 'gyur// rgyun tu gang gis gocha yis/ 
32b4(rgyud): gokochocha bgos par 'gyur// go cha'i go na 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu stsol bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib me legs grub ste// gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis/ 
32b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis gdon kun dag/ 'jig par 'gyur te som nyi ma bla/ gnon pa kun las krol 'gyur te// nad kun las kyang de bzhin no// pha rol dpung ngam pa
32b6(rgyud): dpu ngas// me thub pa yi dgra kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal ba la gyin// rtag tu gnon las babyung ba dang // rgyal kun tu yang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags 'char rnams bdab rgya phyir/ 
32b7(rgyud): de nyid dpa pa 'grub 'gyung zhing // 'phags pa spyan ras gcig 'dapa' phes// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon chad ga/ dgos pa kun gyi rjes mthun par// gang dang gang du bkod pa dag/ de dang dang
32b8(rgyud): ra'agyur// pad+ma la phyisas bgyi ba'i// khan lan po yas mdzes pa dang // u dran ma la lang ba ra ya ba'i sreng// ma par rtog pa ladapar bkye// phyag kyang ni kun srog las gyu sa 'di dgasams
33a1(rgyud): 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje'i mnga'// dkyil 'khor pa d+ma rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad+ma rab gnas pad+ma gnyis// rtag tu pad+ma legs par bgyid// badz+ra
33a2(rgyud): chung de bzhin du// bad+ma'i mdzub mo d+ha gyings// pad+ma'i lcags kyu bal sa sbyar// pang+ge'i lcags sgrog bad+ma'i gas pa// rtag drug pad+ma sems dpa' dang // no bu pad+ma do rje gsungs// da
33a3(rgyud): tun shing 'chang // nor bu dbyug pa me tog daphyug/ de bzhin zhags pa bdun 'dzin dang // chu srin 'dzin du 'khor lo
33a4(rgyud): de pU ra rtag tu serba/ zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang // thod pa 'dzin dang tshems shing dang // me tog phur ma bgrang phreng dang // rdo rje lnga dor yo mags// don yang grub pa de dag ste// phamra
33a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba// gang dang gang du dgod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tha ma// 'di dag kyang ni bri bar brtse// kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor
33a6(rgyud): rgyan gyis klubs par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ngas sam ni// dpa' ma rtsig par bgyis pa 'am// ci yang rung ba de dag ste// de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sa me/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod
33a7(rgyud): ka tu sdig pa thams cad spong // mnar med gnas su gtogs pa dang / mtshams med pa ni lnga nyid na// thams cad skad cig tsam gyis 'byang // sems can dag pa dran 'gyid na// phyi
33a8(rgyud): bached du gyur// sems dpa'as bcu rab tu gnas// 'di'i phyim mi ldog pa'i gnas// gang lags dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin nig d+ha na d+ha 'i po
33b1(rgyud): sa// gang gis kyag tu 'di mthong ba// rgyun tu mchog sbyin mdog rten dbang // rtag tu mngon sum mthong ba 'o// de dang mtshungs te khyad pa rang pags/ gsang sngags sum cu rtsa lnga ca/ 
33b2(rgyud): bgyid thams cad 'grub// de ni dus rnams kun tu yang // ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rab myur bar// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'od dpag med
33b3(rgyud): 'o// du 'ong 'gyur bsam nyi med// 'jig rten mgon gyi thugs rnal nas// skyes sras tab cu cu bo nga byar// dren pas 'di ni chos nyid dang / cho so las skyes pa lung bston 'gyur/ 
33b4(rgyud): kA'i sal bye ba brgyad stong dang // mnyam pa'i bye ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// tshad med
33b5(rgyud): pad dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i phob par 'gyur ro// gang gis sug par phyag d+hA dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur na/ phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yon sa
33b6(rgyud): ba mchis par bsgrags so// de la gsang sngags ni/ oM sa sak+Sha san dzam mal ciman+da/ oM ya shwA sa ya k+Sha Ni ban 1n+da/ oM ma thal ba hU~M/ oMs sa twa n+t+rabat+ta/ ya
33b7(rgyud): oM pa hr-i da pa k+Shat+te nAM/ oM bris dbyes das rba e wAn tA d+hA dzA tAM/ oM dre m+b+has su rba d+hi/ oM oM ku sha a mo g+ha A ka ri sha sa trA~M/ mig pa ce sa tu ru hU~M/ \u0f7fsa ma k+She sha/ ka me+e la ma
33b8(rgyud): kr-i rbane bA man tsu rje 'i hrI/ e a mo g+ha mA na co la mi la~M trA~M/ oM ba dz+ra Nu tsi li hU~M/ oM a mo s+t+rai nI da la tsar ca gud+ha ba N+Di dz+dza/ oM k+Sho// pa ti tsa tsa hUM/ mi bden/ bad ga tsen+da ya sha/ drun
34a1(rgyud): oM ldems pa re shwang+ku t+ti Ti g+h+nA TitrA~M/ oM rdzas traM/ oM ma Ne ma Ni trA~M/ oM sum+bas ti dpe na oM bo d+hi ti tA bA sha d+ha d+ha ra trAM/ oM bad+ma thA sha bi shud+d+ha trA/ a badz+ra lA she b+has
34a2(rgyud): kAdurmA/ s+yai p+ta pa Ne pA ga bdan hU~M/ oM kra bA/ r+tha rak+Sha t+ta ka d+hu d+hud+ya Sh+pe/ ma d+da shU la pA sha bi sa ka d+hA ra ya trA~M/ yon ga d+hA sha pan d+hi la ka dul duthun gan bru~M sha ba ta ya dz+dza/  pra dzad
34a3(rgyud): oMtsa naM dra bi ma me She sho d+ha la an d+ha ka ra ra sh+mi bar hUM/ oM rba l+h+wam hU~M/ oM baM wa la pA N+Da ba ra d+he/ yo la / be r+pa nI/ oMb N+Da mAn+ta la nga ya tAM/ oMs ti sa kle ker/ l-I/ mas na tan pra ta ra tsA
34a4(rgyud): pa hUM/ oM man bi sho d+ha ma mA lA bi ma le hUM/ oM bu dA ba ti su gan+d+ha bi de hUM/ oM pA sha sa ha sra gu ni tek+Sha Na kA Na tAM/ oM badz+rod k+She pa su tsa~M mu
34a5(rgyud): ning rgya ming rgya hU~M/ las pa phyag bya'i ga da/ de bzhin gsas kyus kya kyad pa/ khan gcig bzlas pa pa dang ni// phyag rgya ma 'ong gdongs pa pa/ ga pa thams cad yo la 'dams// myung du sa ma
34a6(rgyud): nyid thob 'gyur// cho ga shib mo sbyar du 'gru ba// don yod zhags pa rnam par grol ba yi// dkyil 'khor dam pas 'grub par 'gyur// de la mtshon ma'i phyag bya ni/ nor bu rin po tshe dang / me tog dang / pad+ma dang / ril pa ste
34a7(rgyud): sngags dang / nod bu'i phreng ba dag bza phre 'dun/ rung la ra 'od pa dbyug to mdu zung da / dod dub ce gsum pa dag/ ci gsum la gdengs dang / mdza gas te dang / do nang/ dgra sma dpa/ 
34a8(rgyud): yi bzhin neng bud ga mamatshan cha dang / be tshon dang byug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang / rab kre dang / 6/ 
34b1(rgyud): sa ma /  /  sa/ ma ldan da 2pa dang/  pa sa kun 'ad pa dang
34b2(rgyud): dang / 'byung ma sdug pa dag dbu dang / snod bum pa das bum pa dang / zag dang dang / ldan po dang / sgrub 'gyel pa dang / gzugs dgra rgyam ma cad dag sa zin dag tad gsu pa dang / 
34b3(rgyud): dkyil ba dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ral kri dang / ze dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rtsa gsum dang / su sun di dang / ma
34b4(rgyud): gcig pa dang / phyag rgya zhi ba dang / mche ba bzhi dang / zlum po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / de nga dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / pad+ma'i dung dag ur+d+ha dang / gos dang / sarba
34b5(rgyud): dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la ping ka dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khru khrung dang / ma bya dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / gdong bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rtsegs ma dang / bum pa ga
34b6(rgyud): da dang / nyis dkyil la 'od dang/ pad+ma bzhi dang / pad+ma gsum dang / rgyamatsho dang / me tog dang / phung ma dang / skams pas dang / ri dgas kyig yang gzhi dang / de lcags srog dang / tababs
34b7(rgyud): bzed dang / chos gos dang / mkhar bsil dang / sosang dang // bgyed dang / ska rags dang / gtsug phud dang / mchod phyir sogs dang / bya ba ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas dang sde dang / phyag
34b8(rgyud): mtshon cha 'di dag ni// 'jig nyen 'dran pa sa gsuras pa 'ams nas grol gakyil lalas gsas pa 'di// don lagagags pa mcho gar can// ram sa ma gos lam brtseg pa'am// tsal
35a1(rgyud): 'ang 'dri bgyid pas// dgos med legs gsal lags 'byor pas// mtshan gsal sun dga' bad+mar gzhag/ phyag rgya sun nas 'bar bar 'akye// thams cad phran
35a2(rgyud): nga bas na// don dang las rnams kun stsol cing // phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phog/ de ni mod la 'bras bu ster// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di na byin byas
35a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang shAkya yi// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlag/ de lta bas na mkhas pas su// rtag tu kun nas mtshon bcangs na// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te// sras
35a4(rgyud): kye thu bong som nye med// phyag rgya rim byed dam pa 'chang ba gang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sras byi thu bor 'gyur// don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba yi// rnam par grol ba'i snying po pa
35a5(rgyud): named// phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/ 'di 'chang ba la myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod pa las thams cad dang / rjes su mthun pa'i chags pa bdun bshad par ba
35a6(rgyud): nyid grub pas ci lta bu'i// cho ga'i cho ga bsgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tsham pa yi// de dag kun ni rtog par bgyi// de nyid grub pa'i ci lta bu'i// mtshan nyid gzugs ni ci bzhin pa/ 
35a7(rgyud): bslab pas zhags pa ni// smad pa snga las 'grub gyur te// gas dbugs 'dzin pas med pa ni// 'grub par 'gyur la som nyi med// ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang // an/ kha me dang dag gas/ 
35a8(rgyud): blad pe shad pa'i sdud pa ste// srad pa 'di dag bkal nas de kho na nyid kyi cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pas zhags pa ras sdud kyi rgyu las blangs te/ tshad bzhin bkal nas rtag tu spang ba pa
35b1(rgyud): legs pa bkrus pa/ mtshan tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas pa nas pa ma'i phyags bu dang yod pa'i zhugs pa'i rnyed pa ya ngan byams pa' sems dang
35b2(rgyud): denas shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas/ brjid pa sgril du bkal te/ don yod rgyal pos thal mo sbyar bas pad+ma la phya ba thogs pa ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs brgyan thams cad
35b3(rgyud): ces klubs pa'i lus phyed pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad bgyi'o// bkyes nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis te/ nges pa'i gzugs dang / lo ga nyer gyi bzhin dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ 
35b4(rgyud): dngul lam gser las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug bzhugs pa'i thong shog cig rdo rje rtsa gsum pa dang / myu rung lhan cig spel ba gdags par bgyi'o// de nas reg sngags
35b5(rgyud): 'chang gis lar gyi ngo'i chas bcwa lnga 'am tshes brgyad la legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhag gcig mchis te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa
35b6(rgyud): bkyes te/ tshig gzhan mi smra bar zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas/ de'i steng du zhags pa bzhag par bgyir// 
35b7(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyad par bskur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang 'dug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o// a kar dang
35b8(rgyud): dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mar ma yang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sags 'chang gis yangs ya la lam nyi sha rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ 'ag
36a1(rgyud): mo krung bcas te/ 'khrugs pas gdugs rtse'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yangs kar de de la bzlas brjod rere bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor zhing stong rtsa ba
36a2(rgyud): gi bar du gdugs re re mchis par bgyi ste/ rdo rje thog pa sa gdugs rtse'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchod pa bgyi'o// bzas ngan pa spang bar ba yi'o// lhag ma dang lpags pa spang bar bgyi'o// 
36a3(rgyud): kos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// stob rgya brgya bcang nas zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni me'i kha dog du 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa grub na ni/ 
36a4(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sna byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang lags legs so// khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub
36a5(rgyud): sems kyi 'gas pa 'di 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems bla na med gzhug cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongs su gtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa
36a6(rgyud): sheg/ 'on te 'jig rten pa sgrub na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bus bsams pa ci lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ci ltar yid la bsams shing smon pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs na gsang sdug
36a7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par bgyidang / thams cad bkug par 'gyur ngo ro// phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de legs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyis te
36b1(rgyud): mod la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa 'am mnar med par ma chig shi ka na yang de'i legs par 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang / 
36b2(rgyud): so nye bskyed par mi bgyi'o// thog nyid kyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na/ lha dag klu dag gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ming bci dang / 
36b3(rgyud): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas/ reg sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchi bar 'gyur sang / ci srid mtsha'i bar du bran bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang byon pa dang / 
36b4(rgyud): btsun po'i 'khor thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro// gang gi don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgya ba
36b5(rgyud): zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyis med la bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thams
36b6(rgyud): cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshal na lo'am/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// nam byams pa dang / steng
36b7(rgyud): bskyed nas/ de'i tshe don yod pa'i thugs pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na phyir bkrol bar 'gyur ro// dpung gi nang du 'bangs na dpung rnams grazhugs pas bcings par 'gyur ro// 
36b8(rgyud): 'byed pa'i dbus su 'phangs na mtshon cha dang / gatsho chen dang / gzhu dag/ mda' dang / mdung dang / ral kri dang / gtan shis dang / mu sin dri dang / 'khor lo dang / phag mdung dang / 
37a1(rgyud): thams cad dag kar dang / ya la thabs cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur // rab sungs kang la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor na tshul ba
37a2(rgyud): gas pa la gdugs gcig bzhin ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// gang gi don du bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i migs pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 
37a3(rgyud): snang ba bsgrub par 'tshal na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pas bong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung nas don yod pa'i zhags
37a4(rgyud): pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod pa gyis na nam mkha' la mche bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngags
37a5(rgyud): 'chang gi 'khor los sbyar bar gyur/ gas bu 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lo bye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil par 'gyur ro// stobs dag brjon
37a6(rgyud): 'grus pha rol gyis zil gyis ma gnon par 'gyur ro// char pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na ci tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// ta chang char pachas pa dgag pa'i slad
37a7(rgyud): 'chod pa bgyis na char pa bkag par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / bangs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas reg sngags la
37a8(rgyud): sa par daklas bgyis pa gcod pas gos gtsar ma bgos la la ga pas grags pa blangs na gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa bci
37b1(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i steng po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas zhags pa 'phang na de dag rnam sa cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bgyed pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan byed
37b2(rgyud): thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / me mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'degs pa dang / khams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas chen po dang / su ka'i
37b3(rgyud): pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / drung dang / tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
37b4(rgyud): dpag tshad brgya stong khyor yug tu mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// ci ste ci ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/ don yad rgyal po mtshad pa
37b5(rgyud): bgyi zhing bzlas brjod pa kyi gsol bar yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang / gsol ba bgyis pa tsam kye mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi
37b6(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo las ci skad gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams kyis cho ga de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas skad cig de'i modo la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa dang ste
37b7(rgyud): dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bkye'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtsi bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dkon ma
37b8(rgyud): gsum la gus par bgyi'o// da bskon gshegs pa thams can la gus pa dang / bla bar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o// mig cings spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul
38a1(rgyud): bsgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhir gyi nor bu byang chub dgug par bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa'i 'khor ma
38a2(rgyud): chog sgrub pa bshud par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chad de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog phrag tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas
38a3(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gan
38a4(rgyud): su 'jug pa dang / 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang / bru'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'dug pa dang / zang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnas/ 
38a5(rgyud): su 'jug pa dang / skar ma dang sgra skar gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / ri la rmya ba dang / 'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste/ ci lta ci ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig
38a6(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga'i bsgrub pa tshogs chung ngu dang / rtsol ba chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la yid gnyis dang / som nyi bskyed par ma
38a7(rgyud): bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang par gyur pas legs pa khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bkros nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal ba/ gtsang ma de kho na nyid la gus pas
38a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag nas ster rje bsam pa pa dag pa'i yid kyis chos bcu gsum nas brtsams te/ 
38b1(rgyud): 1'i bar du gsal ba shin tu 'akra shas pa la dus gsum du ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bkyis la/ rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi/ dus gsum rgyun du bslang
38b2(rgyud): bkyi// nyin par dus su lan gsum ste/ mtshan ma'i dus su lan gsus pa gyi// 'khor lo zhags pa bla med 'ang// skud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyiste// ras smad pad+ma'i sdud pa dang / 
38b3(rgyud): ana'i skud pa sum 'gyur du// de re lags par tshad bzhin du// khru ni sum cu rtsa drug bkyi// 'khor la rnam pa gsum las bi gyi// rgyan song bzhi mchod lags te// snying por bcas shing ma
38b4(rgyud): klad bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag/ gser dang dngul dang zangs las bkye// chos bstan legs par brgyan pa yi// bzang po'i snyan pa gzhag par bgyi// spos kyi dkyil
38b5(rgyud): khor me tog gi/ sel ma bkram nas bum pa dgod// de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bshams// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan pa shams par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor
38b6(rgyud): zhags pa gzhag par bya ste/ mchod pa bgyes la bsams pa ci lu ba bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa lnga'o// de nas tshes bcwa lnga'i zla ba nye ba la nyi
38b7(rgyud): ga gcig mchis par gyur pas tshig gzhan mi slu bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri ma'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi zhing / bdug pa rnam pa gsum po/ a ka ru dang
38b8(rgyud): nadan dag ku kul rnams 'bul bar babya'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi sran mchis pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas/ don yod pa'i dgas pa'i snying po
39a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bkrus te/ yungs kar de rim bkra' brjod la rmed pas/ zhugs 'di ster du gtor bar bgyi'o// stob rgya brgyan chang nas grags pa 'bar 'dzi 'a
39a2(rgyud): nam mkha' la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags sa chang gi yub kyi spyod dang /  bye nas 'ad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ ri mo'i dbugs las legs so zhes bya ba
39a3(rgyud): sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'char gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'khor lo grags pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di 'grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas ring sngang
39a4(rgyud): 'chang kis mchod pa chen po bgyi snga la/ don yod khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rdza brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs pa blang bar bgyi'o// lag pag
39a5(rgyud): ba 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing // g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor lo 'i tshul la brten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs
39a6(rgyud): 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pa gyi'o// dems bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdus du bskor bar bgyi'o// des
39a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dma' chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los spar ba'i rgyal po chen po legs
39a8(rgyud): mthong rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ reg sngags 'chang gis rkang ba spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad ces kyang sba bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gas ci bka' stsas pa lagyi ni
39b1(rgyud): zhob 'don de dang dethams cad bskyed par 'gyur ro// bran ni rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las brgyad par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang ga gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas/ 'di ltar du
39b2(rgyud): gsus rnamachis pa sa/ thugs pa zu ba kyi/ lagag sreg sags pan zugs la gyi// nga yod pa la thas la
39b3(rgyud): te/ zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags pa btab btsam gyi mdo la gnas kyi drug gi go thams cad phyesapa 'gyur ro// yul la khor dang / gtan pa dang mu ga dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / gsegs dang
39b4(rgyud): 'bab chu dang/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lam mi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang / bcom pa dang pa shigs pa gyur rog gtan bdan stso glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / ljags sgrog rnams dum bu rnam
39b5(rgyud): byung bcad cing kyis par 'gyur/ nyams par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur so// shin tu mga' dang shin tu khrim med pa/ shin tu rgyam pa'i gas pa med lang saskyong 'a rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// na
39b6(rgyud): po che sna tshogs las 'akra ba rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnapa/ ring pom lnga tshig sa gyi ston shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal med pang mthong bar 'gyur ro// me chog sa tshogs kyi rab shin du dri zhim po'i ba
39b7(rgyud): med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rin sngags 'char gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khong mo'i phyag rgya tshul pa don sum du bgyis nas/ don yod pa'i sngags pani snying po bzlas te 'dreg par bgyi'o/ 
39b8(rgyud): lpags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas gnas mtshol de yang nam pacug tu 'phrul ba dag / gal po dang ldeg pa dang / 'a ru ces ches te na'i do zer gyi snang 'tsham pam ldang b.rang du'o/ 
40a1(rgyud): dmas dag sngags 'amar 'jug par 'artsag/ nas ngan yang pa rnam par ga sesem sa da sanas pa byu/ bad pad rgya gzugs rtan gyis brgyar pa/ sa byang
40a2(rgyud): kyis klubs pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ lnga'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba'i baitsa mrar thogs pa mchi bar 'gyur ro// sma bud med kyi gzugs 'chang bar mthong
40a3(rgyud): kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas/ gzi brjid thams cad dang / stobs thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas ri ka sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhugs pa mdu
40a4(rgyud): bcing dbang bgyi ste/ mthong ba tsam gyis mod la de'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / kazi brjod nyams par 'gyur ro// mthu chung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bud med de rgod pa dang / oM zhes pa
40a5(rgyud): bas gnon par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po bzlam par bgyis te/ kha bub du bskye ba nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te cha ba de la reg par mi bgyi'o// don lod rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ de nas
40a6(rgyud): mig tshugs kyis blta bar bgyid na/ rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas bzhu bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i cha ba 'byung ste blang bar rabakyi byug par bgyi'o// kun tu blugs pa
40a7(rgyud): kyis num mkha' la mche bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs na phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chubs
40a8(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang dang / gnas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gang dag bzhugs ga gnyis la 'tsho ba dag ra
40b1(rgyud): mnyes na mchas pa dbazhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag phangs su ma ngan las 'das pa dang / gang dag mthun pa dang / gang dag da ltar byung ba dang / sangs rgyas pa rnams pa
40b2(rgyud): gdaka ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang / de bzhin du ci ldang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 
40b3(rgyud): bdag nyid la kun nas byugs te/ des byugs pa cas gyis pags pa'i mdog lha'i gsar dri bar 'gyung ba// swa snga la cung zad 'khyim par 'gyur ro// mig lha'i ut+pa la sdod pa
40b4(rgyud): mchog 'dra bar 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sbyang ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag bcwa brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur
40b5(rgyud): ro// lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo gad+hA'i klung gi byes brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ci ltar yid
40b6(rgyud): bsams pa dang / yid la banags pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog robargya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lnga'i btung ba chen po bdud rtsi'i ro bro ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur
40b7(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mthun zer mdun nas rgyug par byed do// dgra thams cad dang / dgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad
40b8(rgyud): bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / gtugs pa dang / gshegs pa dang / btsal ba dang / byas pa dang / phye mar bgyis par 'gyur ro// ya na sman gyi bud med de'i sa kun bton te/ ska rags
41a1(rgyud): babyas nas bcing bar babya'o// gang du bcings pa de yang na ma chas bdun du 'gyur ro// gang du shugs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la ska thams cad gnas 'chang
41a2(rgyud): bya 'gyur ro// kA thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / ma'am ci thams cad dang // ga sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du pa che bar 'gyur ro// 'thong de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la thus
41a3(rgyud): bar dade'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing slar yang ldog par 'tshal ra sman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi ba gyi/ reg par
41a4(rgyud): gyi bar lag pa'i phyag rgya gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thams cad na gnas pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bus thams cad phyir byung nas mdun
41a5(rgyud): sdong bar 'gyur te/ kha cig gi lag na ni bum pa gang ba'o// kha cig gi lag na ni gdugs so// kha cig gi lag na ni lha'i gos thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i nor bu rin po che thogs pa'o// 
41a6(rgyud): tshika ni dri dag go// kha cig ni me tog dag go// kha cig ni phreng ba dag go// kha cig ni rgyan dang lhab lbub sna tshogs thogs so// kha cig ni kyog pa dag go// kha cig ni bre'i phye la dag go// 
41a7(rgyud): spos chus rin pa che sna bdun sde snod bkang ba dag go// kha cig ni sa'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ 'dra dang / bu kra ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / san d+ha ra ba dang / san sbar ga yen nga
41a8(rgyud): da shika dang / man rdzogags pa dang / bdag mangs dang / mdag sangs chen po dang / ate sug Na shA dang / tsam pag dang/ 'ang dag dang / paso ka dang / man gatshan dang / 
41b1(rgyud): rnam pa dang / sngam dang mu ti ka ga sums tog dang / ka ta dag/ klan na par sheg matog gachags so// kha cig ni sa tshar dan kya ni na ga sa kyi rna 'dug pa dang
41b2(rgyud): tAngag dang / tra ma la'i la ma'i bdug pa sogs pa'o// bcig gsag par ni ma bya'i bsal ga' lags so// kha cig gi lag pa na ni la ma'o//  tsug gi leg par dem dang zung ngo // 
41b3(rgyud): gi lag pan ni rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang / btun shing dang / mdang rtse gsum pa dang / bzod kha gnyis pa dag go// kha cig ni go cha dang / la lad bsgos nas pa
41b4(rgyud): bdanas 'dug mche bar 'gyur ro// ba cig ni rin po cha sna chags pa'i snod dang / gser gyi snong dbya sngal kyi snod dag thogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis tog dang / gser gyi me tog
41b5(rgyud): gal ma tog gis bkang ba thogs te/ de dag thams cad dag sngags 'changs dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang / sangs
41b6(rgyud): rgyas yid la byed pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug do yin pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba yid la bgyi'o// mchog tu brtse ba'i yid la bgyid pas tshig gzhan mi ska ba dang
41b7(rgyud): dbyung bar btu zhing las drang po nas 'jug par bkye ste/ sang+ka'i thos mngon par mchis nas/ don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i grags pa thog mar sa ng+ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags pa
41b8(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / kham pa bzhi pa/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang dang nyid mchis dam/ skang du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
42a1(rgyud): 'gyi zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin la yang phyag bgyi'o// des dgra thams cad 'pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro// gal te 'og tu phyag brgyas na
42a2(rgyud): de nas 'khor los rig sngags 'chang gi phyer rgol ba rnams mgo 'chad par 'gyur ro// reg sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu ldanas rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
42a3(rgyud): ro// tsa po'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lnga'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal med khang chen po nas dbu rngan
42a4(rgyud): dang / cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bsrur bar bgyid do// dbang bskung ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi chang 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi char dang gos kyi chang
42a5(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / lha'i me tog bkram pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu mo rin po che sna bdun
42a6(rgyud): sdod du bdud ci'i bcud 'tshal te/ mchis nas 'bul bar bgyid do// dgra sngags 'chang gis blangs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par 'gyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'a
42a7(rgyud): sa rig pa tsam gyi modo la lha'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgra lhag par slob dang / mig ud pa la sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par
42a8(rgyud): ra ro// tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro// gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshal na/ de'i bcud kyis len mchog las ci tsam 'chal ba blangs te/ lha'i chab cen dan gyi
42b1(rgyud): de ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phrag ge slo rang khye bar 'gyur zhing / ci ltar dbang phyug ce 'or mazugs 'dra bang mthong na ni 'jig rten thams cad
42b2(rgyud): btod gnas kyi gtso ba gcig bur 'gyur ro//  ltar 'phags pa spyan pas gzigs dbang phyug pasen du regasngags cing 'di yang mchod pa dag 'as byed blams tha ma bgyi ba de lta thu
42b3(rgyud): ro// gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// cig pa 'am ri 'am ka ba 'am/ ljon shing ngam snod dam/ bum pa 'am/ rnga bo'am/ gos sam
42b4(rgyud): so ba sa ga na de dag thasus cad 'das bu'i chu bo'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas/ dkris pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas reg sngags 'chang ma'as/ lha mo 'am/ me 'am ci mo 'tshal na/ re
42b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang gtsang ma gos gtsangs bgos nas/ lags par krus bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bcwa lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa
42b6(rgyud): bgyis nas/ nyin zhag gcig gnas par bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bkyi ste/ de nyid
42b7(rgyud): mdun du tshig kazha mi zla bar/ yan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs ka pe'i nas bzlas brjod dkyis bzhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan stong rje brgyan tshang na pa zhags pa de yang skal bzhin du longs
42b8(rgyud): la la'am ga ngas pa'i tshul dus chis par 'gyur ro// denas de/ sngags 'char gas gas pasrungs // gnas pa sa so ya/ ma'am ciganas pa'i mtsha ma// sa gnas @
43a1(rgyud): mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'bras te/ gnas bye nang du zhags pa 'phang bar bkye'o// 'phangs ma thag tu sbar yang kho nar drang bar bgyi ste/ ci lta bu'i don yid la bsams pa
43a2(rgyud): don de gags pas pa ngas nas/ tsi sta bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i nor ram/ dbyigags/ gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu tig gas/ 
43a3(rgyud): nas ka she la 'am/ bye ru'am sa la sbram mam/ dngul lam/ gos sam/ chas sa ma/ rgyan nam/ gzhan yang gzhal med khang ci lta bur 'byor pa can dag don du gnyer na zhags pa 'phang bar

43a5(rgyud): po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ rje'u rigs kyis ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa 'am bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i ming nas
43a6(rgyud): zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi modado la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyur ro// tha na ri dwags dang / bya dang sang+ga dang / skrag dang / glang po che dang / ma he yang 'dren par byed do// gang gi ming nas
43a7(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs na/ de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na

43b1(rgyud): bas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las pabs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ci ga yi la bsams pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// 'on te zla ba da

44a1(rgyud): yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pagyis nas rjeng gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bkyil/ 'phangs pa tsam gyis mod la bud med rin po che yi gzugs pa/

44b3(rgyud): skye tshul na bdun du reg par bgyi'o// ngo ma'i chab kyis res pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal mad kyi dkyil la

48b3(rgyud): ga can po 'dis la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang grub pa'i mchog de/ khyod kyis don yad rgyal po'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis pa d+ma'i gags pa chen po grub kyi
48b4(rgyud): deltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig/ khyod kyis yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni grol/ khyod skye ba dang / ga ba dang / 
48b5(rgyud): dab dang / chi ba'i myang na mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na/ khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni yongs su

54b7(rgyud): / b+h+ya8thAb swAH/ a tho g+h+ra'i ku At+ma/ bdA con dAm smye d+ha/ marbas skye dz+hi / ma /  sogs nga // na
55a1(rgyud): nang bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngag pa 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnananan
55a2(rgyud): mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyuraro//

55a4(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyis gnas sas 'dag tu mtshad pa'i ra sbyin gyitshogs chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gsags pa cad pag med kyi tham marje
55a5(rgyud): rik+Shin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// bad ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med das/ rag sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngar
55a6(rgyud): 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' las chu 'bebs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsams btsam
55a7(rgyud): kyis 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'on te mi 'tshal na na mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'char thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya
55a8(rgyud): sgyu ba gyur po ma chis pa'i ma ma pa byung ba na ga pa chang gis pos su thor bar 'gyur ro//  bskus pa pa sa spyanan
55b1(rgyud): yon ta babs na lo khri 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang zhus pa chen po bgyed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang bab napa
55b2(rgyud): sngags 'chad de lamachod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bskyed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mtshad pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// rnathams cad kyi
55b3(rgyud): kun du bsrung ni daphyag bkye ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsub thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
55b4(rgyud): sa dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas parang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dag/ lba dang / klu dang / gnad sbyin dang / dri za dang / l+h+wa ma yin dang / rnam mkha' rdzi nas/ 
55b5(rgyud): be'am ci dang / lto ba phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba'as/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtags pa thams cad kyi na bzhin gshegs pa rnams sa
55b6(rgyud): bsodon mas kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba dge ba'i rtsab chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am/ lha'i zhal las kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyis yin gyi mchog sa/ 
55b7(rgyud): dedebazhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba 'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang / chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba 'am/ nyen
55b8(rgyud): de mchod pa'i sbyin bskyed par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par 'gras te/ gtsang las zhol gtsang ma bzhos nas/ ci 'byor pas dkyi 'khor kru bzhir bgyis la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa gan ngas

60b1(rgyud): sngags gtubs par 'gyur zheg/ gnas thams cad stongs par 'gyur ro// mug gi sgor bskor na/ phrul lakhor dang sgro glegs sems cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro// gtan pa thams cad gtugs pa
60b2(rgyud): gyur ro// gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur/ thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad du tsa ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur
60b3(rgyud): ro// ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yang rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'char des skud pa lnga las bsgrubs te/ tshon rtsis kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin du
60b4(rgyud): gtubs la/ sgrub par shin tu 'os par las sgrub par bgyis// de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / mad+hu'i me tog dang / ras sa'i me tog dang / sdor ros dang / pad+ma ga sar dang / na ga pus pa dang / shings
60b5(rgyud): 'omo de lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag btsal te/ dus gcig tu lhan cig tu tam du ta gi tso bor lags par bsdus su/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ sbrul 'khyil pa mgo gsum
60b6(rgyud): gyigadang sa katsun yongs su 'khyim pa gsar gyis g.yogs pa/ legs par skal ba ni zhugs pa'i mchog legs sos+ho ga sngags pacha 'gas lags par khrus bgyis la/ gtsoms gos gtsang ma bgos// 
60b7(rgyud): / pa'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ca bzhin bgyis te/ dris mchod par bgyi'o// ma tog gi semam dang / thum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// bdan gyis kun nas brgyan parab kyi'o// dkyil 'khor ci
60b8(rgyud): kyiganas su snyan pazang pos gapas te/ de'i spyad du sgyu'i gags pa bskyil nas gzhug par 'gyis / sbrul gyi ma do'i gdengs ga dbus mni la shang phyogs su bstan no// dgar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhan
61a1(rgyud): mad yodi dag ba snad dag / bdug pa rnam pa gsum san dan dang / sa gdu du drug rnams pagrags/ bras pos dag su mag byam pa'i dkyil 'khor bkyis
61a2(rgyud): lags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du gzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po'i kyis ti/ rig sngags 'chang gis skyes mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas bzlas pa rjod pang du 'bye'o// thog par do
61a3(rgyud): zags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas parjod pa gyis nas/ gro ba'i rgyal po lan stong rdza brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs gar re re nas sbrul gyi mgro la gtor bar bgyi'o// sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/ rgyun du sAl ni la
61a4(rgyud): ra'agyur/ snun las zhags pa g.yo pa de// yang bzhi nam kyi ma tsam du// sman la sa gyen du 'bar bar 'gyur// de nas rig sngag sa 'chang gis bzung nas mi gad bar gyur nag/ klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu
61a5(rgyud): chis na/ klu'i gnas kyi sgornams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ ga sngags 'char gis thugs te na yod rgyal po 'azlas nas/ sngal kyi gags pa la na gsum du bskor b.rab gyig/ danas shA phyim la tsun ma ma
61a6(rgyud): yal pa sachis nas rig sngags 'acangs mngon du skabs rigasngags pa car thugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur / de nas rig sngags car shes sbrul rtsi gags pa pa zungs pan nas 'jug pa kyo dam
61a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'amang gis su ni skyon de mi mthong shi nub par 'gyur ro// phrul lakhor dang / glegs dang / gtan thams cad gtubs shing bcad par 'gyur ro/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs paH
61a8(rgyud): mo mongs ma rgyan thams cad kyis bcan ci klubs ma mangs ma mchis nas/ rin po che'i phreng ba lags te/ rig sngags bachar la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'char gis blangs nas
61b1(rgyud): nad ste/ gzhag pa tsam gyi mod ya klu bu mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis bzed nas btung bar bgyi ste/ tshe nyi waM thub par 'gyur ro/ skra cung
61b2(rgyud): kyil par yang 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal phyogs bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang
61b3(rgyud): kes sbrul gyi zhags pa gzhag la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra pi ra'i lcug ma la~M bkrus nas byab par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas mod la thams
61b4(rgyud): grub par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches pa'i du
61b5(rgyud): sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por gzhag ni char ha cang che ba las bachad par 'gyur ro// grang ba'am/ rlung ngam se rab 'bab pa'i dus sun par sngar bu'i zhugs pa phyogs bzhir bskor na/ da
61b6(rgyud): dang d+ha khor khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// grang ba'i rlung dang ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lo khyud 'khor tshar bar mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// nyen gcig bzhin
61b7(rgyud): donon yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas brdegs pa/ lag pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na/ nyin cig bzhin lha'i nal zas dang
61b8(rgyud): btu ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas skye bo stong stong tsam la stsal bar 'gyur ro// de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pas
62a1(rgyud): pas gzung gsag pa g.yan pas klu bzung nas/ dpyid dam/ stan kha'as/ sprin chadas pa'i dus sunags pa bsgol la khro ra'i rgyal po bzlas brjod pa gyis te/ nam mkha' la 'phru
62a2(rgyud): tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo tog bzang po gang ci yang rung ba bzang po shin du smin pa/ kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig pa
62a3(rgyud): rnas pa'i rgyal po ldan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'azlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i gzhal ya kyang dang / gos dang skyab grub dang / kun 'byung dang / rgyan thams cadas la 'bab par 'ar ro// gal te rig sngags
62a4(rgyud): tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags
62a5(rgyud): gis rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa gzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsabargyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsnun la/ de nas sbrul gyis
62a6(rgyud): pa blangs te/ rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhugs pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// 
62a7(rgyud): gsul 'gyed pa na/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bkris nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbus su pa phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig bgrad pa/ lce sbyar ba mig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur
62a8(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyi mdo la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byer par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kyiste ci ltar yi la bsams pa'i don da de lta'u ras 'pha mas par byed par 'gyur
62b1(rgyud): kyi zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas 'byung ba'i dbang phyug gi gags pa bsgrub par mtshal na/ grong srid pa dang / rtsod pa can po lhan cig tu bgal bdag / lcags las mdu mnasum pa sar bzhi'ichod
62b2(rgyud): mdu bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan skyong du brgyan pazlas brjed bkyis nas khro ba'i rgyam po lan stong rtsa brgyad zlas te/ nyin zhag gcig mchis la lags par khrus bgyis te/ gzar ba
62b3(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhugs pablangs nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gis gzugs 'dra bar
62b4(rgyud): gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// zhags pa lag par thogs nas/ du khrod du zhugs
62b5(rgyud): / du bzod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi stobams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ning khyod cing dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal bde bgyid par 'gyur ro// rang ma bul du btags pas khro ba'i rgyal
62b6(rgyud): popo bzlas na de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing / ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// bkrol na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gamo sbyin gyi mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs
62b7(rgyud): nas shAd ljin de yang bdun du marjes nas/ gasngags par la rje btsun paka'agrol teg dang tham pa la ci gis sra ba gyur / rig sngags pacing gis khyod nga med 'tsho'i ba dad sa pas ma ga gzug
62b8(rgyud): las gyis shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyen gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na/ las thams cad bamed par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal ba
63a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo mchis nas/ reg sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ reg sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing / rig sngags 'char ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// 
63a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo lam dang / chung ma dang / sring mos bslab par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// gal te ma zhig du bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / 
63a3(rgyud): btung ba dang / mal dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su myong bar bgyid do// chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/ 'kho ba'i ya byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dag
63a4(rgyud): bar rtse bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gal te sring mo nag du bgyid na/ yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ 
63a5(rgyud): cad du rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad stsol bar bgyid de// nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug
63a6(rgyud): par 'gyid do// sa thos kyi mgul du btags te khros pas drungs na seM ng+ge bas rgyal po'i zlas pa rjo ba kyisan/ de nas nam thos pa chis nas/ nyin gcig bzhin dong ma stong stsol par 'gyur/ gas
63a7(rgyud): stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa la bstsol/ bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la khro ba'i rgyal po lan bdun ba zlas brjod bgyis te/ mos pas la
63a8(rgyud): pa rnams pa'i mil lcag gis brdeg par bgyi'o// nan po chen po ma sgra byung ba dang / rig sngags 'char skrag pa mi bkye bar sla 'gros pas brdeg par bgyi/ de nas kyi mthag pa dag rig sngags pa
63b1(rgyud): sa sa dang / bag la bgyis nami gda' bar gyur nas gtang thams cad mamang bar 'gyur ro// den marig sngags 'chang gas slar yang thal mas brdeg par bgyis te/ de nas nag po chen po khrag du sngags pa/ 
63b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis byugs na nam mkha' la mchis nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ nag po chen po rang gi gzugs rgyas mdun
63b3(rgyud): ches nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid ceng / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci 'chal bgyid pa dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyu
63b4(rgyud): du rtse gsum pa bsgrub khe chog 'o// de nas gzhan yang zhugs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rimar chog de khon nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga blan med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgor byos lnga rdzogs pa'i/ 
63b5(rgyud): ba'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa'i// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// cho 'phrul snga tshogs gzugs bstan te// lag pa stong dang mig stong dang // ma'a' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstar// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs// 
63b6(rgyud): gsum dag tu bstan pa ni// gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to// gsang ba 'di yi gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rig sngags sgrub pa bla na med// de nyid zhags pa bsgrub phyir
63b7(rgyud): debs rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jug rten pha rol rjes mthun pa// sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang // de bzhin gshegs kun blta ba dang // bde can blta bar 'tshal ba dang // de nyid 'jig rten 'ang
63b8(rgyud): pa yi// 'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal ba// mchog tu gus par bgyi ba yi// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus par dad pa dang // shin tu dad pa nyid du ba rtse// grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal
64a1(rgyud): ba la// sna chags pa la gzugs bstan te/ sna chags 'bas kyis sa pa'ang gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog// don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das// don yod 'bras bu dam pa po// don
64a2(rgyud): do kun du grub pa'i 'o'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig tan mgon// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig rten na 'tshal ba// mchog 'tshal pa
64a3(rgyud): grub par 'gyur// don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'char// de lta bas na kun bskams te// bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas// ci ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin// rjes su mthun
64a4(rgyud): par ri mo'i gzugs// rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing // zhags pa gzugs ni sde tshogs dang // de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // ga sngags rgyal po de bzhin du/ dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang / 
64a5(rgyud): ne sreg rlung lha chu lha dang // khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang // lha dang klu dang ston pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri za dang // na' mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ 
64a6(rgyud): phye chen po'i gzugs kun du// 'jig rten mgon po mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang / tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dang dbyug lhad pa ni// dbang phyug chen
64a7(rgyud): nyi ma dang / zla gzugs rgyu skar tshas grangs lha// 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan// sems can rnams la phan 'chal pas// gdul ba'i don du grol
64a8(rgyud): 'i lam// sems can rnams la bstan pas nand pas som nya nyid mi bgyi// mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags// ci ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams// ci ltar mthun pa
64b1(rgyud): pa bo gzugs//  ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa bsgrub// gnas 'di gang du ngas pa dang // ga du sa mas na dga' bar 'gyur// goms pa gang gi phyag rgya ba/ gang gi dkyi la 'khor bar dbye ba/ 'phags
64b2(rgyud): nA ras gzigs dbang mgon// kun tu sgrol pa 'dren pa'i gtso// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba'o// don yod grub pa'i grub pa thob// don yod dgos pa thams cad dang // grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo no// mchog
64b3(rgyud): del yang reg par 'gyur// zhags pa dang ri mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi skyon sreg ge cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrod
64b4(rgyud): / sgrib pa thams cad 'jigs par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'doms pa/ bgags thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ 
64b5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi bzad pa rnams 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung ldog pa'i mchog/ nad thams cad 'joms pa/ 
64b6(rgyud): yod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab modang/ rtsod pa dang / babyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yam pa kyin dang gnod pa 'doms pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi
64b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin rgya rnyed par dka' ba lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu
64b8(rgyud): rnams dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam brtag su nyon mtshan du gzigs par mam nyams cis pa/ byang grubasams dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur gangs kun du shin tu mnyam par
65a1(rgyud): rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur la gas so// de nas rig sngags ra shi' ba dang ldan pas/ gtsang pa'i gnas sumachis nas sbyin sregapa kyiste/ gtsang ba yin ma phyogs sa ma// com mchis dbyen
65a2(rgyud): // ni ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / dag yul sno pa rnams pacwo'o// bsapas can papa 'a / don du rdzogs pa sas/ sa parnam bar tu napam dun
65a3(rgyud): par gyur/ dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang // gnod sbyin sbyin thogs dpa la// gdugasems can rnams thad pa dang // skrag par sngags pa drug shul spyod// gsang sngags sgrubs pa'i sbyin theg te/ 
65a4(rgyud): / do na na /  yan rna po// des ldan pa [] / ma
65a5(rgyud): ska nyid dag dang // shin tu bkra shis dgal ba ni// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po 'o// bzang pos gtor ma'i las brgya'o// bdug pa pa tog la sogs pa// bzang podag ni 'khor bar dgo// sog ma me
65a6(rgyud): bkug nas ni// de nas sbyin sreg las rnams pa ci// rig sngags 'bang pagaca gyur pa// legs bkrus gtsang pa'i gos bgos nas// gas sngags 'azlas pa'i chog pa mi// de la mtshams kya
65b1(rgyud): sa tu //  /  ma dag ga /  tan bas pa na rnas pams dag
65b2(rgyud): rogs te sna badz+ra babyu drug/ bi shA da/  pra ha nas rba da nga gra/ de bat+tAH// gan sa/ shan tam sa bi rtam na/ san d+hakAn+na/ mus ta sh+les pri la thA g+h+nAnA d+ha pa ma tam la las / 
65b3(rgyud): ti sh-in mun / thagano lagan su 'de hUM/  drubal bdag sa dz+nyAn// sel bar rtod pa de ba na/ be+e shA / ma ldan sa dge b+ha ga ma sa dal tad d+haH/ da
65b4(rgyud): ma sa sa d+has rnams// / gsung sngags nyis ni len 'dun // bzlas na pa dkrug pa ba ste//  sus grangs kar bar sbyar pa// thar bdun thar bsam la dbul// mtsha
65b5(rgyud): dun pas dbum pa ya // de bzhin tha ba'i gle bas so// dri rnams dang ni thug pa dang/ bdun pa kyir rgyal ba ba / de bzhin 'bras bu spang par 'dus// de das chab kyis pas pa / 
66a1(rgyud): sa rnarnams rab banan du tu gu dag kyang dbul bar brtse// de nas rag sngags pachang gis su sbyin sreg las ni pang dag pacas/ khrigs shin tu dag pa dang / thag
66a2(rgyud): 'ba' dang / snga ma'i ma tog cam pa dang // kar ni kar nyid dag dang / pad+ma srid pa la bang shing dang / de bzhin dri bda' can dan dag / byang chub sngon shing gang dag dang / de bzhin gzhan yang dri ba da
66a3(rgyud): 'on te 'bras bu'i shing ma dang // ga mi shi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhin tu dag ste// de dag gis ni me sbar nas// sbyin sreg ga na las rnams bgyi'o// 'bras pos can dun phyem dang / 
66a4(rgyud): da du ru ka/ kun tu ru la sogs pa dang / du ru kar bcas s+thi ka dang / spang spos pri yang gu blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar bsras shing // mar ram mar mar lhan cig rje// don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags
66a5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyan gyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad chung ba dang / nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs
66a6(rgyud): bar shin tu gnas pa lhags nas phyogs bcur blta zhing kun tu brtags nas/ rig sngags 'char la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so lags so// 
66a7(rgyud): chos par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi chog grub kyis mchog slongs shig dang / thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog
66a8(rgyud): bla bar bgyi ste/ ci ltar blangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas reg sngags 'chang gis mchod yon gyi snong dag 'bul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bkye'o// 
66b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsreg pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin phrag bgyi nang / 'bram bu'i shing tha rad ga/ don ya zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyi'o// stong ca blda/ 
66b2(rgyud): ba dang / zab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung na / dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du 'bul bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs par ba
66b3(rgyud): blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhig/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rig sngags 'a

72a7(rgyud): babad na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che ba stsal kyang / gtugs par ma 'gyur ro// la dul don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snyed pa la

72b2(rgyud): // ha chang char chis na bsgob bzhen/ ha cang rgyar chen po 'gums par bgyid do// rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / sar pa thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par babyed do// phug gi sbyor la du la lan
72b3(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod bgyes nas/ phug gi sgor bsnun na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa dang / sna glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas
72b4(rgyud): pa thams cad phyir byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// nags chung tshong gi dbus su 'phangs na/ nags tshar tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas

72b8(rgyud): g.yogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po che ba dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang lo lags pa dang / lo nongs pa dang /

73b1(rgyud): rgod kyis te/ dpa lha mtshan mo'i lag par bya la na/ dpal lha ma nam dbang du gyur nas/ nor can pa stsol cang

73b3(rgyud): cig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/ 'dod dgur sbyar ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ltar

73b6(rgyud): gyur nas ma sha gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ba dul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ nag pa chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su gtsug na ma mo'i chags thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi

79a2(rgyud): byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi 'byor pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'a tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba yang gyi ngo rje chos brgyad la

85b2(rgyud): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje 'a rigs dang / dbang sa rigs dang skyes bu dang/ zung med dang / skye pa bu mo mas rtag tu nang mi mchis par 'askur ro// bde bar 'tshe ba dang / yid la dgang nang
85b3(rgyud): mgu bar 'gyur ro// brams bu nga/ snyi rje'i sems kyi gnas par 'gyur mo// lnga dang / klu dang gnod ston dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i rdzing da ma'am chi dang / lta phyir po de dag kyi
85b4(rgyud): cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag cad pabacwa khor khor yug tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro// 
85b5(rgyud): rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te/ yangs su myong ba dang / bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'azung ba dang / yongs su myong bar 'gyur ro// dbang
85b6(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug chen pa'i lha'i bla rnams rtag par rgyan du bzung ba dang / byob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro//  rgyal po sumra naHgsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / changs pa dang / khyab 'a klu dang /

85b8(rgyud): su'aphreng ba dang / yongs su spyong bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / kye'u dang / bu bo thams cad la babyung ba dang / 
86a1(rgyud): ba pa la rgya so sa smyed sa sa sa lam das pa mas

86b1(rgyud): kagi don pod pa'i nanas d+ma'i snying po rnam par thol pa'i dkyil 'khor chog zhi yo rgyal po chen po brjod parabagyis ste/ 'dim bsgrub pa par las pa rgya stong ba kyi dpag gyur ro// ches grang sa dang
86b2(rgyud): po dang // shin tubapa shis mchog dag la// legs par zhus bgyi gos gtsang ba co// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag/ sems can kun la brtsi bA dang // snying dram pas brgyan pa dang/ 
86b3(rgyud): ni khyod zhags pa'i rig sngags che// grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal// 'grags pas las rnams thamasas dadaka/ 'grub par bgyid de som nyi med// 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po ga// de bzhin kyang dag rtaka
86b4(rgyud): rjod na// lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyi// phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur// ci ltar gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la// bsod nam pa phung po
86b5(rgyud): sa rgyas bya ba bskyed par 'gyur// sbyang ba bgyi sa pa 'i bras /  gcig/ yabs pa'i ming ni brjod bgying pa// dge slong ba dang ge slong me// dge ba snyen po ma sad byin du// bde brdzun zang du

86b7(rgyud): kyil 'khor ba gyi// klu ba ni khor kho drug tu// chan ci dkar ba nib ma yis// grub che lham par zag gdab po// ngos po'i rnams su ni bzhi dag/ dbus das nges bzhi ga shengs su dpag

87a4(rgyud): bas ni 'tshal nas su// dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzlas brjod bkyi ba ni// don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag/ dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad// 'phags pa'i dziH
