109b1(rgyud): bar bya zhing / spos da ldan pa'i til mar kyi mar me ga/ ma par byas na/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi modo la byur ngan pa thams cad med par gyur ro// sdug pa dang tha lam nganar pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa
109b2(rgyud): lanags ngas pasu ky-i sa pa thos rgyas pa gang pal lan ma te/ mug pa dang dag thabs ca yog pa cu migatan pa'i nga chen po nyams su myong ba gyu'o// da
109b3(rgyud): cadan ta la dang 'bras so pa'i sbyin sreg gis so// nad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal na tshul bzlas pas so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar byan/ dus gsum du lan gsum du rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin pa
109b4(rgyud): bzhi bar ldag ro// bcings pa dang lcags srog dang por sbrul gzhol na nyid de zhing brgya cabargyad bzlas pas so// rgyal po dbang du byan lam pa che ba rgya rtsa brgyad pazlas na rgyal po'i khor dang bcas pa dbang
109b5(rgyud): 'o dang rkun po rings par byan/ rA dzA kro shA ka'i sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so// ma rengs par byan seng ldeng gi shing la bzlas te mer 'acug nas bzlas na me rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// chu rengs par byan ka le ke'is
109b6(rgyud): nang du brje ldan nu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// dug gzhi la nan bya'i sgo mas so// btson rings par byin shing rnams lcags kyis tshig pa'i thab pa la bzlas te gtor na mtshon ma thams cad rengs par 'gyu'o// ting
109b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa dzin gyi sdug rgya brtses te phrulan nyitid len stong sa bar 'gyur ro// cos sbyin padrug rdzogs par dod pa'i rigasas bya dge song / dge song pa lag she da dpa/ dge ba sden mangs pal
109b8(rgyud): des byaste/ na gyis tsha sa bya zhes sul ga sa dag / gsu kyis ma da nyon chogs ma/ lags brgyad ga pa da su sa na
110a1(rgyud): nas bum pa sgos rgyas gagang ba bzhi gnag pa/ bcod yod kyi snod pa ning po ga yong mas 'i ma pa sus su gnas pa zhi pa yag tug pa dul ba bya'o//  ba sted du sa
110a2(rgyud): ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhag par bya rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing spos kye mar me bane dang bar bya/ mchod ba rgya chen po bya/ bdan gyis brgyan par bya ni nga kyil 'khor bya ba la
110a3(rgyud): gi kyil 'khor gyi nabus su skyil mo grang du 'dug sde ba zlas brjod stong rtsa brgyan bya khro ba'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad pazlas brjod byas napha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ning baphags pa
110a4(rgyud): rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa sku smyon par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can brgya stong mang po ladul na ri'i rtse mor stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// snang ba
110a5(rgyud): thams cad gzhos par dod pas da ma 'dung cigasum la lan stong brtad pa nas// de yod ba'i nags pa phywag rgyas cham ra bya gra zeb rgyal ba'i brdegs pa'i phyag rgya macings te gro pas
110a6(rgyud): la brgyad bzlas nas/ gser te dag la yang sa bdu sa sogs pa snang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// gsathams cad zab pa dang gsang ga la 'ams cad la byu ba dang byalam ba sa
110a7(rgyud): 'bru cing yang du rdzogs par 'dod pas don yod pa'i nags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong nye shu bzlas nagrub pa chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'dod pas spong grag sa
110a8(rgyud): gnyis 'tha de ni gshegs pa thams ca dpa bsrung bar 'gyur // de du nga cu 'dum pa sa dang bsrung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan thug du dang bcas pas/ leg gad de 'i
110b1(rgyud): na gshegs pa nyid 'jo' par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nabs mnan te khri ba zlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra gyur ro// phyag rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod pa
110b2(rgyud): nang ldan las sa dan byab rgyas brjod ldan s+hod byas nas/ g.yul kyi 'dug pa dbub pa byes na/ 'phags pa byagan po'i rang gi sdug chags kyi mdun 'dug par 'gyur ro// khams cad du bri ba'i rgyal ba
110b3(rgyud): ching ba byas na/ ma bsgrubs ma bklags par 'grub cing cho ga zhib mo mtha' yas par 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btad snyoms dang /

115a1(rgyud): 'jun dang/ dbang phyag chen po dang/ rgyal po chen po bsed/ skrag pa par 'gyur ba ga ga ya dang phra grong sa dong ba lams cad dang / byam chen gnas kyi 'i rgyal romams cad dang / cu
115a2(rgyud): dpa sgru dang / ku gang dag tun gnas pa thams cad dang / rgyamatsho chen po b+ha dang / lha gang dag la ka'i grong byar na gnas pa thams cad dang / rig sngags 'tshang gi la khor los sgyur ba thams cad dang / gang
115a3(rgyud): ngama'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lha thams cad 'khrugs par gyur nas nam mkha' las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
115a4(rgyud): dbyug de la yang mdzod pa'i phyir/ 'i tog nam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sra su d+ha dang / yut+pal dang / bran da ga dang / bA dwe ba dang / sman du rab chen po char dang / klu'i rgyan dang lcab grub kyi tshor bram
115a5(rgyud): bau ti la phab ste/ lha'i sil snyi dang / klud kyangs len cing d+ya ha zhes kyi mo dang gzha'i sgra bton nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spun ris gzigs dbang phyug gis/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu

143b8(rgyud): gang shi dang yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod kyil nas de rang gi bo bdun na gnas par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyung

144a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa dang / bsam pa dang ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// yang nang phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rang gi sku bzhin nun tshwa
144a6(rgyud): dngas kyi tshe mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// mchog pasam pa thams cad smin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad grub par mdzad par gyur roto// don yod pa'i dbyug pa reg 'dzed 'khor los sbyar bkrung

144b1(rgyud): par bya zhing khros pas dkrug pa bskod na sa da da bu rlung dang / seg se pa du batshams chen po tu bcad bar 'gyur ro// gdodan kun gyis rkyen bral khro ba'i rgyal po la lan bdun dran

156b7(rgyud): padang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'ching ba dang / dron yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kye sku gzugs dkyil 'khor sa mngon du sogs par gagag go// lha'i phyogs rdzas rI 'dra ba'i gnas

162a7(rgyud): snatshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum nus pa sna tshogs dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te/ phreng ba rnam pa
162a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun du tshon lnga lnga'i ba dan gyis mdilal brgyar te gzugs pa dang / slo bzhi chang dbye ba dang / bum pa gzhag pa ni legs par rabargyan cing dra tshul

212a4(rgyud): sman de sorje the ba rtan cig sus mdon 'di ba'i rgyam bas pargya stong babras brjod kyi 'o// de rjen spang ci dka ba dang / na na'o// bye ma ni 'jig ted dbang phyug pa phul ba'i matog dang skan
212a5(rgyud): cig smra'o// til mar bcos pa ne bra ma ti la ste/ shing ba la sha'i mar dang lhan cig smra'o// kha gdong bkru ba ne tsan dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig spu zheng su ma na dang / gur kum dang / spos chus lhan
212a6(rgyud): ga sus la so sor brgyartsa bcang bzlas brjod bya/ khro ba'i rgyal pos nyi shu rtsa gcig sras brjod byam nas dbang bskur ba gyu'o// de nas reg sngags 'chang nyin 'ag gcig sbyang ba byas pa/ 
212a7(rgyud): gcig tu zhus te/ dbus kyi sdong kyi nang du bcug la/ sa sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brdad byas nas shang phyogs kye gnas dkyil la bar du gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khar mchog sa phyag da na
212b1(rgyud): bzlas la de nas so sor darang kyis kha bcad de/ dkyil 'khor kyi snying por gnags don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa/ gro ba'i rgyal po brgyas brgyang bzlas bya rjod byas dbang ung bar bya/ 
212b2(rgyud): dbang bsrung bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bsrung bar bya/ banas dkyil 'khor seng por de// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste// bdug spos lnga dag dbul byab// a gar dang tsan dan
212b3(rgyud): da // smrig gu dgum du dra ka/ mchod yon sdod ni rdza dbul zhing // gtor ma la ni dag ste// ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgang // ra ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtar mchal dbul bar bya// kun
212b4(rgyud): phreng ba nyi shu dang // ma dra ma nyi shu lnga dag dang // sras kyi bye ma lnga dag dang // spos kyi cha ldang bya bas byug/ 'phan bran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags// tshon rtse lnga khris mdzes par bya// gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs
212b5(rgyud): bu yi// bum pa gang ba nyi shu mra// rin po chen phrag zhug go/  bzhi grwa pazhir bum pa brgyad // brgyad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khar me tog 'bras yos dang // lungs dkar nyid gyes mngon par dgram/ 
212b6(rgyud): slob dben tha ma mchod pa ni// gos dang sdod dang ldan gyisas// thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug lta /  ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor sleb dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil
212b7(rgyud): gshegs par gsol// de nas las rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshogs bya// den yang chen po'i gzhal med khang // rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsapa// de nyid dngos grub bsgrub slab// de bzhin /

213a1(rgyud): // 'de zhed kyil 'khor bshad bar bya// kun nas krung ni skal ba ste// grwa bzhin ni legs par dbye// zho la'i tshad de legs pa dang // snga tshogs rnon gyi theg skud kyis// dkyil 'khor
213a2(rgyud): bathig gdab po// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi steng por ni// lakhar la bang badz+ra / dbus kyi lte bar pa ma // 'khor logs la 'bri bar bya// bad pa'i snying po gser dang ni// dngul la ma tsan dang
213a3(rgyud): sa byas pa// 'bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// 'khor lo kun du rtsibs dang ni// mu g+had dag gis chang dbye'o// dkyil 'khor snying por grwa rnams der// lha yi dbang po tshangs pa dang / 
213a4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po bri// kun dul kye rnam pa dang // bad ma phreng ba rnams kyi // dkyil la ba bye ma kun du ni/ rtags dang phyag tu rnams bre ste// de rje dgra snyam du cegasum// ra gyi zhags bzo
213a5(rgyud): dang / gai she rje ba can padami gdugs// dbyug ta mdal rnams so// phra rnams kun du phreng ba dang // me tig dam pa sna tshogs dpram// hrI ga ni kyil 'khrur hUM// sa smyeg shin rje chu g+ha dang / 
213a6(rgyud): ga ngan nga de gzhon nu kye// dkyil ba khar grwa bzhin mas pra ni// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ rdo rje legs par bgos pa dang // thob pa kyi 'jigs byed bri// 'di ni dkyil 'khor ma chog
213a7(rgyud): gyi ni dgos pa rnams// legs par yongs su rdzogs par ni// rig sngags je bzhin bstan pa yin// de nas legs par daklas byas la// shes dngang 'gos pa 'jigs med
213a8(rgyud): pa gabazung nyims bya'o// mas pa ba lnga chags dang// b+ha ga/ khu na sa thas ga//  sa na sa pa// sems ca kun pa bstan sa ma// ga tunan dadas
213b1(rgyud): gus pa nyid thob pa 'gyur// reg sngags nga sa bsgrub pa'i mchog/ dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur // rig sngags 'chang gis sngar brus rgyas 'ardzas kyi bri pa gsang bdon yod pa'i rgyal pos
213b2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya// tsan dan gyi rgyal brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas sgra yan chad tsa pa byugs la tshad zin par bsdus nas kha gdong bkru mar bya'o// mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad pa
213b3(rgyud): rjod byas nas bskus na meg bzang bar 'gyur ngo // brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjed byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ngo ro// de bzhin du til bar brgya rtsa brkyang bzlas brjod byas nas sgra yan
213b4(rgyud): cad bsku ba dang / tshod zin par bsku ba dang / lus rkang mthil yan chad bsku'o// yi ge gcig yo yide la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i sgo'am/ skye
213b5(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi dang ngab/ tshogs dang phrad pa'am/ de bzhin du gzha dag kyang rung ste// de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang kha tog tu mthong na
213b6(rgyud): steng nas rkang ba kru gang tsam gyis sngags te 'dug pa/ dza \u0f7f ji ltar 'dus pa rnams kyi bdeste/ de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ rgya po'am/ 'khor sas sgyu ba'am/ mi'i seng ge 'am/ 
213b7(rgyud): pagags/ sred med kyi bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po mig gsum pa'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu lha 'am/ rga shin rje ya/ na 'thos
213b8(rgyud): 'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po 'azhis ma/  dag po man la'am// dgas byed dbadu thug nam/ bi skye'i ma gas pa ba'am/ lag na rnga rje slebs pa cha'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu'am/ 
214a1(rgyud): bzang po 'am/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung ngam/ drang srong nyid de ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna chags yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do// me tog da
214a2(rgyud): 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'gyur bar byed do// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshags su snang zhing gzhal med khang ga nam bdag kyang ston pa/

214a4(rgyud): zugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do// 'gron po 'brog gi nang du byin pa nyam thag pa/ 'jigs pa me bzad pa/ chu med pa/ dgon par mgron med pa/ sdug bsngal drag pa de lta bu'i nang du chud pa

214a7(rgyud): zo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa ba rgyad pa zas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas rba za'i rgyal ba hUM zhes bya bas phyag tu bcings las la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtong bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa
214a8(rgyud): tsam gyis tu babang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
214b1(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang // khang bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyi mnye gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos nga /

214b3(rgyud): 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go/ chu dang yungs kar lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na me snang bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na/ 
214b4(rgyud): dpung gi chags yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ nges pha rol gyi dpag chags dang / dgra 'jigs shing 'jams par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi phyogs pa'i kun du
214b5(rgyud): tor na 'obs 'bad cing rab kha khyer gyis bskor la grong kyar kun du skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan pa'am/ gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so// mtshan mo'i dri'i til mAr de nyid langs
214b6(rgyud): gang sa 'grus te/ brtartsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas rlangs 'a gang ma'i nang du gtad/ rangs pa gang phyogs pa'i kun du gto na kun nas mar me phreng ba 'byung bar 'byung ba/ ji srid dgos 'ang
214b7(rgyud): dadu 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ ri'am/ phug gas/ 'chal pa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na mar ma'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis me snang bar
214b8(rgyud): / rba kya rkyen bgrus gang ga ti na gtang cam kyi ladagra bams ca dadang / sangs kyang ban tshigs kyi grang kyang mi ldang po 'byung // da ni byeng rgos pa dang / ras kyi / 
215a1(rgyud): tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khye nga ba/ tshul gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na 'brog dgod pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad phan tshun ngo mi shes nas
215a2(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos ra tu 'bros par byed do// dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtar na mtshon cha thams cad dang / 'byud pa 'gro rje thams cad me snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro// zham che 'ched
215a3(rgyud): 'dzi nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng du gtor rame 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyed

215a7(rgyud): bang bug gi gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/ gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro bang nyid du rang 'gro'o// lha'i steng du gter na lha'i gnas nas 'pho gang gar dga' ba dang 'gro'o//

215b1(rgyud): kha la 'gro bar 'gyu do// nang pathems pazlas nas 'i steng na rkang bsang bzhin pa me nam/ rngan snang du gang ba gzhag pa dang / rkang rjes byung bab sang du rdzam dang / bub ba dang / bub pa bzhag pa

215b8(rgyud): dan tshogs bstan te/ ma gyi dang dug tar me tog dang 'bras bu rdzo chags pasti te// de zug tu gton na rdzas dang phra snga chags ster to// mtshad tan rnye ba'ang/ 
216a1(rgyud): khang dag/ lha'i gnas su gtor na lo kyang thams cad kyis yongs su gang shing rdzogs pa khang pa dbang po langs pa gnas kyi mchog stor to// grong kyi stong par gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo cang
216a2(rgyud): thA s+yA s+sa can sna ma chags shing sangs sa rdzogs pa dang / thas kyi rgyal po dang/ rdzas su/ gabyas pad / mdun na la / shAn / kyis pa nga / byang med pa/ kyi da/ rnam
216a3(rgyud): stor to// yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i hUM zhes bya bas gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bde bston to// dur khrod kyi nang du gtor dwa shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can
216a4(rgyud): bral ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma ledren ma/ nam mkha' ldeng dum/ dra za'am/ mi ram ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ bya'am/ nya ba'am/ ru stsal

216b3(rgyud): na nye bar 'khod la ji srid 'tsho ba'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// nyin gcig bzhini bdag nyid la gtor na mchod pa/

216b7(rgyud): rgyal po che// khro ba chal ba stabs pa che// de bzhin rdo rjes 'ag gzugs// rdo rje tsa ma de nyid dang // klu chen rab 'joms san yang dang // sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin thegs khro khros cher dang // de nan
216b8(rgyud): mche ba gcigs pa dang / rgyam lo na 'ji sro/ mu'i dbang bsgrubs ces gnon/ minan thags sdo rkyen pa dang/ shug sngon dkrigs rgyab ba dang // 'jig rten dbang byug bdam
217a1(rgyud): phyag dbang babang bstag/ de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang // de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten bya// sna tshogs gzugs ste babang po dang // sred med bu dang tshangs pa dang // drag po dang / 
217a2(rgyud): ni dbang phyug dang // nag pa chen po gas ni ru ngang // gshin rje dang ne t+ya wa nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // rgyu skar sgragacan mjug rengs dang // de bzhin gza' dang lha ma yin// nam mkha' ldeng dang mi 'ang
217a3(rgyud): / gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung ba dpal ldan rnam thas bu// de bzhin yul skyeng mig me bzung // baphags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang // meru thung dang ni drang srong gzugs// nor bu bzang sras
217a4(rgyud): grang ba dang / sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang // rgyal po dang ni dedang dpon dang // tsho dpon de bzhin gyis bdag dang // thab za dang ni rgyal rigs dang // dge sbyong stag dang seng ge dang // khyu mchog de
217a5(rgyud): ben na nags kyi rtsa// shing de bzhin rags kyi rtsa// shing rtswa de bzhin la tags// gang kA swa ti la mun// zlabasal ldan dus !/ lag 'grod nga ni bang ba can/ zhal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang //

217a7(rgyud): gsang sngags grub// rdzas grub nar bu ti kha mar grub// don yod zhags pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// de nyid dngas grub rab ster ba// mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang // lha yi gnas dang de bzhin grong // 
217a8(rgyud): klong kyi nyed dang 'judu le gas/ matse'u dang nying gsu bo dang / rje dang bzhin ci ma ba dang /  khrug srogs dang na klag 'byung dang // gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang // du pa'i thung ba bdes kyang
217b1(rgyud): skyes bu go mgyon bdag// de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong // khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang // de nyid rang du byung ba ste// rdzas nyung gyur bcung gyur kyang // de nyid dngos grub blan med// sems can rnams
217b2(rgyud): le phan 'a tshal nas// bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad// rigs sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub // dbul po rnams ni dong 'thob cing // snang ba rnams ni thams par bskyed// mu stegs
217b3(rgyud): gzhan rnams rang bar bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid// gdul ka rnams ni thar pa 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla na med pa thob// chos 'dod rnams ni
217b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas mthong // sdig pa byed rabs sdig pa 'dzeg/ si rigs byas dbus par ba 'theg// mtshams med ldan pas nam dag don// dbugs mabyin rnams dbugs 'byed mchog/ mngal
217b5(rgyud): rnams de bzhin 'dul// margal ba rnams sgrol pa'i gru// thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas// mgrol ngan 'gro kun las 'grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// lung ma bstan pa lung ston byed// sbyin
217b6(rgyud): dri ba sdig pa rnams// thams cad yod la spong ba gyid de// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// 'aklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// don gyi dngos grub blan med/ 
217b7(rgyud): gang dang gang du stong ba bamed// dgos pa sems cad 'grub par gyur/ yid la bsams pa bkru par 'gyur// de de med ces rnams bsams pa// nga gA yid lab dang pa dang // tshe ltang rdzob kren b.lams pa/ 
217b8(rgyud): delta nas 'phrul ston pa rtse// ches grangs rgyu gar sbyar pa'i tshal// sbyang bab byes me tshal te// tshig je bzhin du sa che bzhin// chog reg sngags rgyal ba bzlas// reg sngags 'chang ba gtsang bya
218a1(rgyud): legs par khrus bkyes gos gtsang dag/ dgos pa bden par smra ba dang // bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ thogs
218a2(rgyud): gnas shing tshangs par spyod// chos ma yin pa spang byed pa// gal te de nyid grub 'dang na// chang dang sha dang kun dong dang // 'dres dang zo 'phra sngags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa sun 'byin pa// rig snga pa
218a3(rgyud): klu dang cho ga tu// chos tshugasang sngags chu ba dang // de bzhin yi ge chub dang // sar sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub med// ma rungs pa yi dam tshig nyams// yid gtsugs pa ni sad
218a4(rgyud): par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun du spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis smad// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spang// rtag tu chos kyi sdong du ma 'gyur// shi nas sems can dmyal bar
218a5(rgyud): gnos// rtag tu spad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dbul po khrus ni sgrub pa dang // mjedze dang kyi chos 'debs pa dang // sdug bsngal rkun mtshas sun babyed// chos rba pa yi lus can no// 'jig rten
218a6(rgyud): ne bder mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol ga la bde// sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin// de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dpa pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing rtag
218a7(rgyud): tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pha dang ma dang bla ma dang / ston pa ni skyob pa dang / skyabs pa dang / dpung gnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa/ mchog sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ 
218a8(rgyud): delas thar bar byed pa/ dbang phyug khyen pazhor sbed ga yongs spyod sbyin pa/ dang po mchog bskyed pa de nyi 'jig rten gyi blam mgon pa 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug mi gan go// 
218b1(rgyud): mchog rten par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa// dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal lnga thogs las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs spyong
218b2(rgyud): par grub pa/ rin po sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par brjod pa/ 'jig rten sdig pasna tshigalas chub babyed pa/ thabs gus pasna tshogs bgyid pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bade bas dgos pa
218b3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu sen par basbed pa/ rtag tu babang pas shin du gus pa 'ibakyi pa lags so// de nas rjes kyi sran grub pa dang /

218b7(rgyud): bri bzlas dza rgya'o// dus gsum du wi ra'i sa rgyal pos

219a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal pos lnga stong // ti la bar de ma hA ru te rab 'grub ste brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro ba'i rgyal pos pa ni stong ngo // nor bu ni srul gyi khrag gis sbas te khre tshig stong ba zlas

223a1(rgyud): du gtor na thams cad tha' gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug go// g.yul bgyed par gtor na thams cad gnyed log par byas par 'gyur la mtshon cha thams cadang
223a2(rgyud): ka thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// me'i nang du gtor ni mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag tu 'bar por 'gyur ro// chu'i drung du gtor na chu mi ma
223a3(rgyud): / bum pa chus bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so// tshul gyi nang du yungs kar gyis gtor ni me tog dang 'bras bu mi snang

223a7(rgyud): sdod de dang de dag nyid g.yol/ los kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyir bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji la ji lta ba da lha de ltar te tshong bya
223a8(rgyud): srungs gang gyis bzlog pa byas nape ldang bar 'gyur pa dpag cod pa te tsam gyi bar du srid no do nga do da du mo spong bar 'gyur ro// rdzam yin kyi 'khor mi la byabs b+hagaci rungs ni chags pa
223b1(rgyud): chen par byams gtA nus 'jim pa gzhags snong byeng bong ltar 'dod pa 'azhin bya ste/ sdod cing ba dngul las brab pa 'am/ gsebabs byas pa'am/ zangs lal byas pa'am/ lhags pa
223b2(rgyud): ba ma/ lcags bra las byas pa rin pobazang po sna tshogs kyis spras pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i snod bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ co chad byed pa yang 'byung ste/ 
223b3(rgyud): yum kar gyi phye ba dang / pidi'i phyem lhan cig sbyar nas tsho dus kyi dbus su gtor ni kun du zong bgrem pa'i snod me sdang bar shes pa thams cad snang bar byed do// thag pa'i steng du gtor na sbrul chen po ston te/ 
223b4(rgyud): dang / rab 'i ngos dang / sgo dang / shed sbyang ba dang / ka nga'i steng du gtor na khang pa dang / ra ba dang / 'khor gyi khyams rnams sbrul du ston to// ji srid du chu dang yungs kar byas pa zlog pa mi byas pa/ de srid du
223b5(rgyud): mas 'dug go/ bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ khang bzang gi ngos la gter na sbrul chen por snang ngo // lha'i steng du gtor la mig sman gyis bsdu/ ri
223b6(rgyud): le bras na lho'i gzugs brnyan de ku tse 'don cing 'gro ste/ gur 'dod pa der 'gro'o// bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go// sangs rgyas kye sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phyems gtor na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs

252a4(rgyud): ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dam ngas rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu me gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa
252a5(rgyud): ring 'a phra ba yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig thob par zhur la des rang bgrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste na gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / khrug la sogs pa byed cing bdud pa dang / 
252a6(rgyud): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdug sa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gil mchod pa byed ma bzhan rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de dngos thub dam pa dang / mchog dang / blan med pa
252a7(rgyud): papar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du dgol bar sbyar ba de dang dor dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro// ring bsrel yung ma kar kye 'bru tsam nig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ 
252a8(rgyud): daya/ bram ze'am/ rgyal mi mams/ rje rdzu gas sam/ dbang sa rigs pam/ gzhan thad med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye bum bu ma dan gis bzhin gshegs pa kye khrib so khrag ga
252b1(rgyud): dngasarnam pa sa na / gags chong ba rgyas par 'gyung/ 'ang bdag / lus pa dang / bdod du dang rgya byas par gyur ro// de dzin gshegs pa de dag gi nga nas bsod dmal kyi phung po dang ldan pa
252b2(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa de dag ni chu du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung du do nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhi gshegs pa de dag gzung du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu so na
252b3(rgyud): slongangs/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyed nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan gang su yang rung ba/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs pa la/ rje'u chags pam/ dalangs rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med ma/ skye
252b4(rgyud): 'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rtsa ba
252b5(rgyud): tu med par 'gyur ro// rig sngags pachang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa thob par
252b6(rgyud): dod yod pa'i nanas pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor bye chog zhes song rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par bye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa
252b7(rgyud): gyur ro// lagan rdo rje de ltang ring phrul yungs kar kye 'bru tsa ba zhi gal ma chod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen pong brjo pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byed kyi 'dras kyi klu zhus kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa yang dag
252b8(rgyud): gru // de po grub chen po chen po 'thob par 'gyung // de su 'od kyis gan do byan song sa byang chu semam dpa' sems das tshan yo sa das pa kyad pa gsogs dang phyun la yongs su dris shig dang phre// 
253a1(rgyud): ba de'i lan ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sded dpon chen po la gnardo rje drugar bya dang / mthu pa dang / yid dngas pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dkar ba dang / yid bde' bskrad/ 
253a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi skabs gnyis la mashes phyag 'tshal te/ song nas byang chub sems dpa' sebs dpa' chen po la lags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste byin nas/ bya bachub sems dang
253a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsul bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa sman ras
253a4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzugs par ga / zhing 'phags paskrun ras gtsigs dab phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gramo zhing gdong du bstal te rtog cer 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches
253a5(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan pas gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyagan rdo rje su 'di skad ces smras po// bzhan rdo rje khyod mig po bar mdun du 'dug ste rdo rje gsong zhing ngal ci nig blta/ mi dag yongs
253a6(rgyud): dri bar 'dod// ci zhig gsol pa 'debs par 'dod/ lagan do/ phreng ba sgros shig/ lagan rdo rje khyod la skabs phyes yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan las khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o

253b1(rgyud): grub pa mang ba dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bra ba mang pa yangs su bsgrags pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par 'azung bar nus dngos ba ji sar shes par bkyi/ rgyamatsho chen po ltung bab tshig ra
253b2(rgyud): tshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar mtha' thug pa ma mchis pa/ shin du rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas na dang / 'gro ba ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang / dngo
253b3(rgyud): dam pa'i gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang / phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags/ mang du yongs su 'u'o// dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba dpagasang sngags dang sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / dam tshig

254a3(rgyud): rigs pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa sna chags pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa

255a1(rgyud): de tshe dang / don yod 'a drim med pa'i ting nge 'dzi du dang / shun du nom yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa dron yod pa'in
255a2(rgyud): dang dbang rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyam sa tshan gyi rje mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge ling du dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod
255a3(rgyud): sa bu'i ting nge 'dzi na dang / pad ma'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od tha

255b1(rgyud): dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams sog pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yus la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa

255b3(rgyud): da pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang / blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab zab mo rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang /

255b5(rgyud): rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ sems 'khrug pa pa gyur/ dran pa dang blo gros mongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gnas ni mi snang na su zhig smra bar dus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi be shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin
255b6(rgyud): ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so// 
255b7(rgyud): khu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa ste/ sgyum lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i nags pa'o// ye shes
255b8(rgyud): rab de zhags pa'o// de snying po'o// snying po gang yin pa de dor yod pa'i nagos pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// smyen pas gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i nag
256a1(rgyud): par snang ba'i ming du dmigs so// gang med la sems pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'jugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin tu ring ben

256b1(rgyud): da pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzung ba dang / dod med pa blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya nas papa'i gzungs dang / dod med pa ni ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gsungs dpa

256b7(rgyud): nyam pa'i dran pa dang / blo t+ya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro// rtag tu dran pa la bcing rgyamatsho chen po bsags pa lta thur 'gyur ro// lagan rdo dran bod pa'i nags pa'i snying po'i gzungs chog ni ba med ltar gos
256b8(rgyud): / yangs pa la gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de lag na rdo rje rje gyur dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang cad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / 
257a1(rgyud): yongs su dad pa dang / mdangs yongs su dag pa dang / mig yongs su da pa dang / nas yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po po
257a2(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod pa zhags pa'i snying po bklags bcas dang / mnyan btsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa tsas kyi sa de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po 'di thob ste/ 
257a3(rgyud): gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de la lagan rdo rje rje gyur rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta yod kyi lakun rdo rje yud tsa zhig rtsod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon
257a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ba' par bstan par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi

257a6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bgad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dad na dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid
257a7(rgyud): dngos pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' 'a chen po nyid thol par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag supa nga ngems shin du skyes pa yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyi
257a8(rgyud): gnas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dga' ba ngo car du gyur ba dang / sos nyid gung pa dang bral ba dang 'azod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa'i
257b1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpa bzhug gdong yod pa 'i nagal pa'i snying po la mabru'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mchog tu rnyed par dka 'o// de nas gdod byin gyi sded
257b2(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phalas pa spyan ram gzigs dbang phyug la dri ma med par sun du snang ba'i nong bu rin po che chen po chos kyi 'gang bar grub das rkang ba gnyis
257b3(rgyud): mgo bos phyag byas nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjed cing sagying bag dang / brjid pazhig 'gros kyis seng nas ngang gi lta la 'dug ste/ bzhin 'dzum pas bcos ldan

263a1(rgyud): // dren dang / dudu pa sogs pa dang bral ba bgyur ro// sems kyi sdig pa yang sdig pa dang bral pa gyur ro//  mong yi pa jud pong du chur cing bsrung bar 'thung /  zla du lacugs ma mchis pa ras
263a2(rgyud): chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// smyung ba ma bgyis pa yang phyung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod pa chen
263a3(rgyud): por 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur ro// dge ba mi spyod pa yang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos mi spyod pa lang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsod nams mi bgyid pa yang bsod
263a4(rgyud): nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis pa yang dul ba'i spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags pa mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa yang kyi
263a5(rgyud): 'khor dag / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// reg sngags kyi gnas dpa' khor thams cad du langs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshal pa yang byang chub dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang ldan
263a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mabasams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sa 'on gyi yul du mgyur pa yang byang chub kyis bon dang ldan par gyu/ 
263a7(rgyud): rol du phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing / pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang yongs su to pa nga me
263a8(rgyud): 'drab ni sbyin pa dang yangs su gtong ba dag skyed pa'i tshogs cher ba da sa na par 'gyur / khabod pa dang mi 'bral zhing bzed pa can pa'i 'thod pa'i rjes su spyod par gyur ro//  'gru ba dang 'i 'bra la brtson 'grus kyi rkobs chen po/ 
263b1(rgyud): sa ladan pa pagos par 'gyur po// khas la gtan dang me 'drang zhing bas mgatan chen po 'thopo padag ti mi nanang dra par gyu mo// rnal pa las pa sa las sa nan pa pag gas pa da 'a'asa' bas ba rgya chen po gyu ro/ 
263b2(rgyud): sngags dag / gsang sngags mi nyams pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang / chog la gakhas par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lashes gnyer chen po'i pham pa rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad du snying du sdug pa dang / 
263b3(rgyud): blas rab kyis par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro// bsam pa yongs su dag par ba'agyur ro// de kyang don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du
263b4(rgyud): dngos grub don yod dag mchog tu rnyed par dka' ga ge ba don do ba di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid do// dngos grub thams cad zhugs par babyed do// sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin
263b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ra 'drel pa bcwo brgyad dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dag / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i 'tha' dang / dond la ba dag stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de dod dam pa'i lugs cwa
263b6(rgyud): 'dis dren par bgyis yangs par bgyid dngos grub mchog 'dred par bgyid do// de ltang mchuche ba dag pan yod che pa dag yon tan chen por brjod pa ma 'do rnams kyi 'bras brkyen pa skyel bar sa byed do// de lta dge ba'i bya chen pod na 'i
263b7(rgyud): ku du sogs par bgyid pas rig sngags kyi rgyal pa dod yod pa'i sngags bya/ 'phags pa kun pal gzigs pa byu gi nyi bani pa cog tu grub ba bla med pa lags sa/ den pa deg snganas 'cha rags kyi bu la garigs kyi bu mo ga
263b8(rgyud): nga dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen mapa ga/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze ba la/ rgya ba gsas ga rje 'u rigs sam// dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba/ bud med dpa/ skyes pa'am/ kye lu ngam/ bu mo 'phags pa
264a1(rgyud): bgasams nga chun pa ga gzugs kyis dathun pa tshal ba dag 'gas bdun sa gapagasas dun myed bye rang gi gzugs sum tsha ba tshal na de sa chog de bkyil
264a2(rgyud): bcing ba dang / gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba dag la gang nga gnyis bu bceng ba dang / de das rkang par bcings pasas phyogs gtsang bar 'dug gnas sam/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dberan zhing 'khrug pa ma
264a3(rgyud): bdag kyi 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsa ba kun nas zlum po legs par thugs pashin du 'jam pa bgyi'o// na ba tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas rnam
264a4(rgyud): bar mdzes par thig gang bcing chen gyisna tshogs kyis bri bar ba kyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bani pa rnam pa dbye gzhin du mangs gsubazhi kun nas/ khyer gyi rnam pa can pa kyi'o// dbus su pa das/ 
264a5(rgyud): kyilo/ kha a brgya rtsa brgyad dga'adab ma thams cad balcags kyu bri ni dbus kyi snying po gis radang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pabagyi'o// na gyi phreng ba zlum brtson gyi sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par bgyi'o// 
264a6(rgyud): nga ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi grwa bzhi lcags su dang nags pakun na sa grub po yang bgyig// byas kyi dkyil lakhor kun du ma tshan pa'i phyag rgya bya chags kyang bri ba ba cim/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwal ni rnam par byebar bya
264a7(rgyud): chen po bzhi 'bar pa'i nang na go cha bgos gadrag shu kyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o// sgo bani rnam par bye ba pa ba dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bas kyi nye/ shar phyogs kyi sgong rdo rje 'chang ni ba'i na
264b1(rgyud): ca zhin la ga/ rdo rje sa kyeng bgacan du 'dzin pa/ rarab kyi med da bar ba na padams bkri'o// bya phyags kyi sgor khro ba'i rgyal drug tshul gyis zugs can 'jigs pa sa byed ga/ pad ma dang nags pa thogs na
264b2(rgyud): bye ba'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bre'o// dub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/ yig gsum pa ra'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mches ba bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor don yod pa'i nags pa gdong khri ga nyer

264b4(rgyud): b.rabyacig// tshon lnga lnga'i srud pas khong 'o yug tan thebar bgyi'o// gtor ma thams cad dkar po gzhags// dkyil labar me'i ros kun du dadu sa dang gser gyi snod rnam pa sna chags pa gzhag go/ 
264b5(rgyud): 'khor lo sor lug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang / 'oms bkang ba ba zhing nga/ mchod yon dang / nabs pa sa pa'i sdod pa'i dang / dri'i snod pa na dang / dris bkang ba'i snod pazhi dang / dngul gyi pag/ ro a kang

265a1(rgyud): su bzlas pas dkyil la 'or kun du gtar na dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar mgyi'o// dkyil 'bar gyi phyi rol du mar me drug cu rtsa ni spang bar bgyi'o// me tog ji snyed pa ma
265a2(rgyud): dgram zhing khor khor lug tu phreng ba gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs ka ra la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang / phyogs

265b6(rgyud): pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang / ka la ping ka dang / mi'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis sems brtan por bgyi ning mchogs tu dga' ba yid la bgyid pa

266a2(rgyud): pa wA bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin nam mkha'i dkyil gnas par la gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun du bdug spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas nying pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dathus nas 'phags pa spyan ngas

302a6(rgyud): / sa rbes d+hA nA pa d+hur ka/ sams twAs sngams na kar nam su ta swA hA ma mog+ha sa swA hA/ a mo s+t+rai hA shwa ya swA hA/ ya tA ma swA hA/ ya ba rA dz+re hrIs swA hA/ a e tAn yas hU~M/ a me d+de su trA ya swA hA/

307a8(rgyud): 'phrul 'di su yi yon tan bshang du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhungs 'dzin rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi ru khyed rnams shes par gyis shig/ 
307b1(rgyud): ra'akhor 'dir 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad ngas gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba thog mar bskal pa drangs med pa nas byangs pa dang srung rje chen po bsgrubs te/ gzungs kyi sde
307b2(rgyud): med ba sdud cing spyod pa la mkhas pas sems can thams cad bde ba la bkod pa'i drar/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lhas chen po gsangs te btang ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de sad ces bka' stsal
307b3(rgyud): ngachub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las yangs te/ gos chags bcos nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
307b4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag la thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags kyi snying po mchis te/ sems can thams cad bde ba la gnas pa bgyi ba dang / nad thams cad sel bar bgyi ba dang / tshe skyong bar brtse ba dang / 
307b5(rgyud): ngas spyod dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / sdig pa yi dge ba'i las thams cad sel bar bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang / sgribs pa rnams sel bar bgyi ba dang / chos dkar po thams cad dang / yon tan thams cad na
307b6(rgyud): 'phel por bgyi ba dang / legs pa'i sa bon thams cad yongs su grub par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi ba dang / ra ba thams cad myur du bskong ba
307b7(rgyud): ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjer dgongs te gnang bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu babs pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan
307b8(rgyud): spyong sems can thams cad 'de ba la gnas par bya ba'i phyir gsang sdigs bshad par 'dod na dngus la bab kyis phur du bshad pa'i rigs so// dang darjes pa drags rangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa zang sa
308a1(rgyud): // de bzhin du rjes su zhugs rangs sogs bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyanangs gzigs dpung phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'dre skad ces gsol to// bdag sngon
308a2(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus bskal pa'i bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od stong 'bab pa'i rgyal po dben par gnas shes bkying lam
308a3(rgyud): rten du gshegs te/ drangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / thugs rjer dgongs pa'i slad du shin tu rgya che thogs pa ma mchis pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i/ 
308a4(rgyud): ngas kyi snying po 'di bshad de/ phyag gser gyi kha dog can bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gsang sngags kyi snying po 'de gzungs su zung la/ phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus
308a5(rgyud): ngan pa na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba chen por gyes shog ces bka' stsar ba dang ba dag de'i tshe de dus nas dang po la gnas pa las gzungs sngags 'di lan cig thos pa tsam gyis 'phags ti
308a6(rgyud): brgyad du phyin to// de'i tshe de'i dus na bdag shin tu dga' ba skyes nas yi dam du bcas pa/ bdag gis dus slad mA la sems can thams cad la pha pa dang bde ba'i 'gyur ba bgyi ba'i mthu zhig rnyed par 'gyur na/ 
308a7(rgyud): bdag gi lus 'di la lag pa sted dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam ba tapa ni thag tu lus la lag pa stod dang mig stong tshang bar byung ba gyur te/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par
308a8(rgyud): sa pa'i mang sa rgyas stong gis 'ad ba ba nas pa ge sum pa tsugs pa'i ngas rgyas thaM gis ba sa /  shAg kyis dang rgyas pa'i 'jig rte pa khams pa
308b1(rgyud): de'i slan cad kyang 'angs rgyas mang pa dang 'khor mang po'i tshogs grangs ma mchis pa'i nang nas yang 'di skad du ngas te/ bsnyen bkur bgyis blangs te/ sems dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ 
308b2(rgyud): dadrug tum mches panas yang bskal pa 'bus drag grangs sa ma ches pa'i spyi 'i dri shin tu phra ba las thar 'gas sa// desre cang te 'du 'bras ba dang kyi ste gzungs su bzung nis bdo kyang ste/ snga
308b3(rgyud): de gzungs su 'dzin pa'i slad du bdag gar byung gar skyes kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pad ma la rdzus shing skyes te/ mngal tu skye ma khyer ro// gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ 
308b4(rgyud): marag/ des yin pa 'ang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'od 'dzin par 'tshal na/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje cher bskyed do// thog mar bdag spyan ras gzigs kyi tshing nas brjod cing smon lams
308b5(rgyud): da du gdab par bgyi'o// thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis chos nyid kun tu myur du chud gyur cig/ thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi shes rab
308b6(rgyud): spyan ne myur du thob brur cig/ thug pa rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems cad thams cad myur du sgrol gyur cig/ thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs ya phyag 'tshal lo// 
308b7(rgyud): bas la mkhas bar du tha~M skur cig/ thugs rje chen po sman ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni shes rab glang ni slar du klags thur cig/ zugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// ngadan
308b8(rgyud): zhes sdug bsngal mchi las myung du na 'gyur cig/ thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis tshul khrims las la skar du rdzogs sur cig/ thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzig
309a1(rgyud): // phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gas kya ngan 'das kyi la byung du gas thu tsag/ drugs rje chen po spyad rag gzigs la 'ag 'tshal lo// bdag gis 'dus ma byas kyi khang par drur du la
309a2(rgyud): cig/ thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis drur du chos nyid spu dang mchun chur cig/ gal te batshon gyi ri la phyogs gyur na// mtshon gyi ni rab tu zhig cing bsgrim krur
309a3(rgyud): gal te bdag gis chu tshan dngas la phyogs thur na// me dang chu tshan rang du zhi zhing med gyur cig// gal te bdag gis sems can dmyal bar phyogs gyur na/ sems can dmyal ba na ne de sdug bsngal rnga
309a4(rgyud): cig/ gal te bdag gis yi dgas bkres ltogs phyogs gyur ma/ yi gas rdzogs pa ra tu 'grangs cu thegagal te bdag gis snya ma yin du phyogs kyu da// lha ma yin gyi ngan sems yongs su 'i
309a5(rgyud): gal te bdag gis byol song chud du phyogs gyur na// bdag gis shes rab chen po'i rang bzhin tha zur cig/ de skad smon lam btang pa 'og tu sems brtsegacig tu bdag dang bdag gi mkhan po
309a6(rgyud): gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa la mngon du dmigs te/ gsang sngags 'di zhag gcig gi bar bzlas pa lan lnga tshang bar bgyes na/ bskal pa brgya stong khri phrag 'bum gyi bar dbasags pa'i
309a7(rgyud): bkud kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi dang gang la la zheg thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'dre'i dzin pa 'am/ 
309a8(rgyud): 'am/ klog pa 'am/ gdon par bgyis na/ tshe 'phos shing 'gum pa'i khar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun der gshegs te/ phyag gis 'dzin cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang nas gang
309b1(rgyud): dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyung ngo ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can 'ang la la// gzugs rje chen po gsang sngags de gzungs su bzung ste/ bzlas pa las ngan songag sum du lhung na/ bdag mangs
309b2(rgyud): par rdzogs par 'a tshang rgyad na gyur cig ga zun patshan na gas sams sas/ cabargyam brjod gyis pa sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma skyes na bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'i tshang rgya bar ma
309b3(rgyud): kang gis thugs rje chen po'i gsang sngags 'di gzungs su 'dzin cing bzlas brjod bgyis pa las/ ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa'i rang rig pa mthong na/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ 
309b4(rgyud): zugs rje chen pa'i gsang sngags 'digapa sa las grasu ma dzu ba kra ste/ bzlas pabagyis pa las/ dka kyi tshe 'dri la ba thams cad la spos na thugs rje chen po'i gzuzub sngags kyi snying po zhes bgyid yang mi
309b5(rgyud): / gang dge ba mi spong ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi bsgrub pa ni ma gtogs so// bud med gang la las bud med kyi lus kyis skyo ste/ skyes pa'i lus su skye bar 'tshal nathugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags
309b6(rgyud): blas par bgyis te/ gzungs su gzung bab las bud med kyi lus las skyes pa'i lus su mgyur na/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yad gnyis sa mthe tsom chung zad tsam
309b7(rgyud): skyes pas ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ngo // sems can gapanag dkon mchogag yul gyi dkor da shal zas la 'phags te/ sbed pa'i sdig pa sangs rgyas song 'jig rten du gshegs pa'i tshe yang ma thol zhing
309b8(rgyud): 'chags pa mi sna ste/ mtho 'du lags kyang theg pa bya ra 'gru pa'i nas sngags 'di 'chang pa ma rnasapa kyi des thag su ga pa 'byung la gyur ro// dkanas chog ga sa
310a1(rgyud): // nor dgra zhal zas lnga sprod pa'i sdig pa phyogs bcu'i dge dun la mtho zhing 'chags na gdong byung ba lags te/ da 'di sug pa rje chen po'i gzungs sngags bzlas pa tsas kyis
310a2(rgyud): bcu'i dge 'dun yang der ltung da byang zhing tshangs par pogyis pas sdig pa thams cad kyang myur du 'byung // mi dge bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / gang zag la sngar ba dang / mchod rten la 'dra
310a3(rgyud): dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / gtsug la 'a khang zhig pa dang / dkon ra chog gsum kyi gir ba rkus pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la mya ngan bgyes pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa lci ba la sogs pa ma
310a4(rgyud): 'byung bar ma gyur ro// gang gzungs sngags 'di la the tsom 'tshal ba ni ma gtogs so// de sdig pa'i las chung ba dang / yang ba las kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur rdzig pa gyi ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ 
310a5(rgyud): 'bul sra 'a byang du lags kyis kyang/ yun reng dubyang chub kyi rgyur ni 'gyur ro// s+yA ngas gzigs dadrang mug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das gal te ldang
310a6(rgyud): rnams kyi gug rje chen po dang ldan pa'i tshig sngags kyi snying po gzungs su 'dzin cing bzlas brjod bgyis ni/ legs pa'i yon tan rnam pa bco lnga 'thob pa dang / gshes ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa
310a7(rgyud): stong par 'gyur ro// ga shis ngan du mi 'gum pa gang zhen/ lcogs te mi 'anam/ mtshon cha dang ljags dbyig gis mi 'gun// dgra na glan pas mi 'gram/ dmagagis ga yul tu 'gum/ stug
310a8(rgyud): dgi la sogs pa'i gcan dza gyis ma'i mus/ sprul dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i gdug bcan gyis mi 'gum chab kyis mi 'akun/ zhugs kyis mi tshig/ dug gis mi 'gum/ mkha' 'grums
310b1(rgyud): 'jug sems stor cing myos pas pi dgum/ re'am brag gam shing ngas ga kar lung ste ma 'gum/ byang snyems kyis ma 'brum b+har srin dang / 'dre gdon byas ma 'gum/ na dngan gyis me 'bug ba
310b2(rgyud): am+b+hi 'grub ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'chang bzlas pa des ga zhes na du bum pa rnam par kyi gyod par mi gyur ro// legs pa'i yon tan btso nga zhe na/ deng nas ga
310b3(rgyud): skye ba'i ser chos bzhin du bgyid pa'i rgyal po dang phrang ba dang / rtag par dge ba'i yul tu skye ba dang / dge bar dris bzang po dang phrad pa dang / rtag par dge ba'i grogs po dang phrad pa dang / dbang po dang yan lag tshang
310b4(rgyud): dang / spyod las ni dul can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims mi nyams pa dang / gnyen pa shos dang 'khor ldan ning 'dum 'phrod pa dang / 'tshog mas dang nor zas yod pa gzhan gyis mi 'phrog pa dang / rtag pa
310b5(rgyud): ces bkur sti dang du dud ba dang / 'tshig chas deng nor bas la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / yid la 'dod cing 'tshal lo cog myur du 'grub pa dang / lha dang thu kun gyis rtag tu margan skyabs bcing
310b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / grwar byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi drung du skye ning dam pa'i chos thos pa dang dam the tshor mos nas don pabang po la rtog pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'chang bdung
310b7(rgyud): bde legs pa'i yon tan nam pa bco lnga po 'di dag dang ljon par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnas khri reg sngags 'di rtag tu sman pa chad par 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod du bgyi ba'i rigs te/ de la lelo
310b8(rgyud): mi rigs so// byang chub sems dpa'i 'phags pas na ras gzigs dbang stug gis tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i dbus su thal ma sba cing lus drang bar bsrang nas
311a1(rgyud): / rgyan thams cad kyi phyir snying rje che rab snyed de/ mdangasu zhing 'dzum dbul nas rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa med pa 'azugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags kyi skye
311a2(rgyud): po mang 'de brjod do// na mo ra ta lA la/ nem mAn+ta pa yig te shwar la/ bo d+his rbA ga/ sa p+pa sa d+hA la/ ak+Shak+Sharba/ k+Sha ye+e/ sarbatha bas rbaH/ tsog na ka rA ga sarbatwA t+te m+ba shas dkar ya/ 
311a3(rgyud): da la bi na Shu Na ka rA ya/ ta sa na ma skad tA/ i ma ma Ir+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ ta ba nAM ya kan+te na ma hr-i dA ya/ mAM ba rA yiSh+Ta mi/ sarba aR+Shi yI ta sa da na na/ shu ba na a tse ye na/ sarba b+hA tA nAn/ ba b+h+ra ma na/ 
311a4(rgyud): bi sho d+ha kan/ tad+ya thA/ a mo ke yo ka/ sa te lo ka/ a te kr-istA a te kr-in+ta he h+ya ta de bai ha rod+hasatwA tabo d+his twA/ da pra yadza d+ha satwA/ he kA ru Nika/ mang hr-id ya na/ hi hi ha re/ Ad+hi ba loka/ te hra
311a5(rgyud): dar ma me tra tset+tan/ kA ru Neka/ ku ru ku ru/ kam sA d+ha ya/ brjen de hi da me/  ka ma na la/ be hang+tha ma/ sid+d+ha ya~M sha shwa ra/ d+hu ru d+ha nA/ kha ya/ ma hA bi la ste/ d+ha rad+ha ra/ dang na tre shwar/ tsa ba~M be ma yar+tha ta/ 
311a6(rgyud): An+ta bA ra~M k+She te hA ra/ dzin kr-iSh+Ta/ dza Ta ma~M kuT/ lasa? pra lak+Sha/ bi laT/ sa hA ba lama?/ sahA sid+d+ha/ bid+hA d+hA ra/ bal bA la/ ma hA ba la/ ma las la/ ma hA ma la/ tsal tsa la/ ma hA tsa la/ kin bkra sha/ 
311a7(rgyud): bak+ta/ kriSh+Na bik+Sha nir+m+ma tan/ he pad ma ha sta/ tsi la tsa la/ ni sha tsa re/ shwa ri kraShA par bkrir te/ yad+d+ho ba bI ti/ e h+ye hi/ ba ra ha mu la/ dri pu ra/ da ha ne shar/ nar ya Na ba la rUg/ ge d+ha re/ he rI kAn ya/ 
311a8(rgyud): he ra hA/ hil te la/ gaSha nir dza te/ log s+ya rAg pa shan/ sha na ga nan/ de sha ni shanan/ mo ti be sha na na/ nir mo k+Shan/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hul/ ha la ha ra/ ma hA pad ma/ ba nas ra sa ra/ si re si ri/ lu ru / 
311b1(rgyud): ra/ bung bud+ha/ ba d+ham bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ma ma te/ sde la kaH/ aHte/ rna ma ste tas d+ha mu/ ka ha sa ha sa/ mun na mun na/ ma hA ha ta ta sa/ ya / sa sa bI shwa ba nab na/ btsam 'phrulas d+has/ 
311b2(rgyud): bdas tha lapa tan b+hag nAtag sog yo k+Sha N+Da/ tathA ga taH/ da ti gde gan ga gas pa/  ni shA/ bral byed man sna/  Ash+ma ma hA dz+nyA ma hU~M/  ky-i ma gA ga r+m+ma
311b3(rgyud): pa ra ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra sid+d+ha mu bA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha bid+he d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad ma ha mA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra ba ya dz+nyo ba bI ya swA hA/ ma hA la ku ta/ dang pe swA hA/ nA dza b+hai Sha swA hA/ shang+ga shas+t+ra b+h+ya
311b4(rgyud): /  d+d+ha sa// 6 mas kas su sa ng+ge es ng+ge// sa na ga su sa/  dunachag
311b5(rgyud): swe ng+ga lo ka ti shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi sab+hA ye/ me b+hAs d+hA ya/ trAk+Sha ru NI kU ga/ sad+han du pa swAt+ma/ nan du ma kyai bi dza mAM/ sa rbo ts+tsha pA / arba tra ta ta hrid b+h+ru~M Ta A hU~M/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa kun/ 
311b6(rgyud): ras ga zegs dbang byug gis sngags 'ad brjod ma thug tus chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yis so// der bye rnams kyis me tog ri po ci'i char bab sna mchod do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyang shin du thugs dbyes du
311b7(rgyud): hAr nas lha'i bdud dang dulhags rnams kyang 'jigs sdug ste byung nang byed de/ 'khor 'dus 'tshogs thams cad 'bras bu'i byed par 'thob pa/  cishin kun du grags pa'i 'bras bu/ 'acig des / 
311b8(rgyud): kyir 'ong ba// kha cig ni phyir ma 'ong ba// kha cig ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu// kha cing des dang po dang / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa nas/ sa bcu ba'i bar gyi 'bras bu thob pa
312a1(rgyud): / sems can mang po zhig kyang de'i dri byang chub tusems bas dang// de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/ gos chags bcos nas bral lo sbyar cang bstan bkur gus pa'i tshul
312a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sun ras gzigs dpang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po legs so// bdag sngon sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa nas chos kyi rnam grangs mang po'i gas
312a3(rgyud): kyang 'di lta bu'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gzungs kyi snying po'i tshigs zos ma myong ste/ skyes bu chen po'i gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags pa bdag la bstan du gsol/ 
312a4(rgyud): chag pa la mang po yang thos par smon to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs pa chen po la smras pa/ khyod thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams dad la pha
312a5(rgyud): dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad du 'dri na/ legs par nyon cig dang / ngas khyod rnams la mdo tsam zhes bshad do// gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/ bams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i sems
312a6(rgyud): 'dus ma byas pa'i sems so// tshogs pa med pa'i sems so// stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i sems so// ri mo gus pa'i sems so// bdag dmad pa'i sems so// 'khrug pa med pa'i sems so// bla na mar
312a7(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems so// de lta bu'i sems ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid ces byas te/ khyod kyang de bzhin du spyod cig/ tshangs pa chen pos smras pa/ bdag la sogs pa pa la mang pos gzungs 'di'i mtshan
312a8(rgyud): nigad 'tshal te/ deng byin cad gsungs su gzungs zhing mi bsrud par brtse'o// sun ngas gzigs dbang thug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las byang chub kyi sems kyi
312b1(rgyud): mas can thams cad mya na las bsakha' phyir/ zhal khrims ngas can thams cad pa snyoms pa'i sems bsta dang / sngags 'ang rna dma'achad par thar pa dben pa zhig tu
312b2(rgyud): ma 'ag de rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / yar ma dang / 'dug spos dang / ga pa dang / me tog dang / rnam nas rnams kyis mchod cing den gzhan 'dang gi sems rtse gcag tu ka nin
312b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ni 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' klu'ad da/ reg 'dzin grangs med pa dag dang ldan ce tu der 'angs te/ dam phan par byed pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ston par 'gyur ro// ras kyang
312b4(rgyud): de'i du dpeg stong gis brtag cing lag stong gis bskyab par bya'o// mu stegs kyagatsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing khong du chud par bya'o// gang gis gzungs sngags 'di gsungs su gzu shing bzlas
312b5(rgyud): byas na 'jig rten gyi 'dre gdon gyi nang brgyad khyi bzhi stong kun gso par nus te me mtsho ba med do// gcig tu na lha ma sri thams cad bgol ba dang lhal bdud thams cad pham par byed pa dang / mu stegs
312b6(rgyud): la bar 'gyur ro// gal ta grang ba las dgon pa na gnas shing bas ma gtan byed dam/ brdo sa sreg pa ram// kha ten byed pa las 'byung po dang ye dgas la sogs pas bgegs byas pa sems me ba ma
312b7(rgyud): dkan gcig bton pa tsam gyis bgegs byed pa rnams 'ching bar 'gyur ro// da cheg bzhin du bzlas brjod byas te/ sems can thams cad la byabs pa dang / snying rje bskyed de/ de'i tshe de'i dus rangs
312b8(rgyud): ngab dang / rong gas pa 'dzin dang / bu'i rgyal pa la sakhas pa pacwo/ das sung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sra ba'i byor dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang shi skad cig tu yang mi 'bral bar/ de ra
313a1(rgyud): pheg dang srog la 'phangs pa bzhin rim gro byed pa bzhin bsrung zheng skyob tu gtsug go// 'di lta rangs ni gsang 'dzin pa la sgong dang // rdo rje tshal ba dang ni lcags kyu dang // su ku chud dang
313a2(rgyud): chen sde brgyad rnams// gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob tu gzhug/ ngas ni sred mod pa dang dbang ldan dang / kum bi ra dang ka ra le ka dang // ba tu chu bdag dang ni legs ldan rnams// gzung 'dzin dal
313a3(rgyud): bsrung zhing skyon tu gzhug/ ngas ni mgrin bcu dang ni tsan da ra// ka lan ta ka dang ne san tsam pa la// ban ke ya dang pin ka la rkyal// gzungs 'dren dal bsrung zherang skyog nga gzhug/ ngas na seng dge be ta sa

318b5(rgyud): yoyongs su 'byang bar mi 'gyur na kha na mtho ba lci ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags// kha na mtho ba lci ba dag yongs su 'byung bar mi 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub kyi ring ba'i
318b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gangal la zhig zugs rje chen po'i sems kyi rig sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin pa de dag ni dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga thob
318b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing gshis ngan du 'chi rnam pa ba co rdza len 'ang mi 'gyur lag so// ga shri ba ngan du 'che bang mi 'byung ba de yang 'di lta ste/ gang zag de bkrus pas nyon mongs te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 
318b8(rgyud): mtshon cha dang lcag dbyug gis 'chi 'ang mi 'gyur ba dang / 'khon mchis pa'i dgra'i mug par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / g.yu la dzad 'chi bar mi 'thung ba dang / stag dang sbyang ki dang gcan man ma
319a1(rgyud): // dras pa'i bar 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kA la gdug bA dang / rtsa das pa dang / sdig pa'i khar 'chi bar me 'gyurang ba dang / rbab dang zhugs kyi nang du 'bying zhi cig ste/ che ba ma
319a2(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / dug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang sems kyisa'i tshe 'das pagyid par 'gyur ba dang / sgos nam dran pa nyams te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de dang / ldan gleng dang / dam thog
319a3(rgyud): dang / g.yang sa nas lhung ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / me ma rungs pa'i byad kyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / log pa'i 'dra gdon ma rungs pas glags rnyed de 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi la
319a4(rgyud): dang / nad ngan pas lus la dkris te 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / chum lags pas bdag nyid la gno pa bgyis te 'chi ba'i dres pa byed par mi 'gyur ba dag legs te/ thugs rngu rgyan
319a5(rgyud): reg sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag ni gshes ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa bco lnga po 'di dag gis 'che ba'i dus bgyid par ro 'gyur lags so// dge ba skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po thab pa
319a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ skye bathams cad du rgyam po dge ba dang madral bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag par yul dge bar smra bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag par dus bzong po dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang / dag par

319a8(rgyud): rnams drer kyis 'dre zhing 'jam par 'thang ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams rtag par 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par gzhan gyis bkur ni ri ma gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / yo byad bdog pa/ 
319b1(rgyud): rnams gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ba dang / yad la smod pa rnams bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu dang dge ba rnams kyis rtag tu srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba dang / skye ba thams
319b2(rgyud): cad du sangs rgyas mthong zhing chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos thos nas don zab mo rtogs par 'gyur ba dag lags te/ lha 'am mi gang la lo zhig zugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs 'od 'don
319b3(rgyud): yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag na dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po 'di dag thob par 'gyur bas g+ha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par bton nas yongs su gzung bar bgyi ste le lo bskyed par

319b5(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mang ba'i thugs rje chen po kyi sems rgya char yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyi nom pa 'di dag smras so// na mo rad na tra yU gnas sa ti rdza pa N+Di hA ra/ 
319b6(rgyud): AtA / ad+na k+Sha se kA gta ma?/ oM sarba bAn d+han r+g+had na ka rA ya/ sarba b+hA pa sa su dro tsi Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba b+hU d+hi pA sham na ka dA ya/ sarba i d+h+ya pa dra bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha yi Sh+ya tA ra dz+nyA ka rA ya tas+ya/ na ma swAH

319b8(rgyud): d+hisatwA/ ta bo d+hi sar+b+ba/ he mtha po rtisata/ he pri la bo d+hi satwA/ he kA ru She ka ma hA m+ba hr-id yan/ e h+ye he/ Ar+yA ba lo ke ta shwa ra ya/ pa ra ma mai dr-iHn+Dak+Sha ru Ni ka ku ru kraH/ ka

320a4(rgyud): sha na~M/ hAng gI be nA nA naM/ ma hi bi Sha be+e n+de ga ni/  tsan+dan tu lut+tA lu/ sur+b+ba suH pra su su hu/ rA phul na du la/ dwe lA drA swA d+ha ra~M mA hA pad man d+ha/ sar sa ra/ si ri ser/ su ru su ru/ bar+b+ha prat+ma/ ba d+hA ya ts+tsha/

320b1(rgyud): ya sA hA/ bA ma tasta byA k+Sha tsam tsarba ni bA sa na ya prA tA/ le ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sed d+he shwa rA ya sA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mu drA nA sA hA/ nA mo b+ha ga ba te/ Ar+yA ba la ka
320b2(rgyud): oM d+hA sad+hA ya/ mi tres twa ya/ ma r+thag du Ne kA na si ng+ge na ma men d+ha ni swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'phags pa spyan nga sa gzigs dbang phyug zhes reg sngags 'disas ma ldag

321a1(rgyud): // sngags kyi cheg gya nom pa 'di lta bu thos par ma gyur na/ skye bu chen po byed kyis bdapa la gzungs dang yod kya kyi mtshan nyid kyi cher larba dbu pal// bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams
321a2(rgyud): shin tu thos par mos so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs 'a chen po la smras pa/ lha'i rgyal po khyod thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa
321a3(rgyud): skadu dris pa yin pas// der khyod legs par nyon cig dang bdag gis khyod la mdo tsa ma zhig bshang bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ de ni snying rje chen po

321b1(rgyud): / ma nyam pa'i sems bskyed de/ rtag par dag sngags 'ang rgyan chad pa med par gdan par bya'o// gnas khang gtsang ma'i nang du 'dug pa/ yongs su dag par khrus bya drugs gtsang ma bgos te/ bdan dpya ma
321b2(rgyud): spar te/ spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa byis nas sems rtse gcig tu gtad de/ dmigs pa tha dad pa zhanal mi dmigs par chos bzhin du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ de'i tshe byang
321b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyu dang / drang srong tshad med pa snyed dag der lhags nas dbang byed cing mngon rtags kyang ston par gyur la/ bdag kyang de'i tshe mig sdong gis de la blta
321b4(rgyud): lan ba sto sa ni la yongs su bsru shing byin gyis rlo la par byed pas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag byed pa de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ su stegs can gyi chos kyi chog dang / smang ji snyed pa thams

321b8(rgyud): de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dal te tshas bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pa/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed pa bgyung na bdag kyang de'i tshe dge ba'i lha dang / kwa'i rgyal ba
322a1(rgyud): // thams cad dang / lag na rdo rjegasang pa ba rnams la rtag par de'i rjes su 'brang zhing yongs su srung ba kyis shig// de'i nye 'khor na gnas nas mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du yongs
322a2(rgyud): srungs shig/ rang gi srog gi dbang po bzhin du yongs su skyobs shig ces bsgo bar 'gyu'o// gang dag la bsgo bar byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gis gsang ba'i bdag po

322b1(rgyud): / dgas bya sa pa dang // sde dpon nyi shu brgyad dang drang srong 'khor// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin 'azhu bar byed khadag kra nor bu bzang po dag nga ni// sde dpon chen pos 'dzin phul pa// btang dag
322b2(rgyud): sungs 'dzin bsrung bar byed// bdag gis dga' bo dang ni bsnyen dga' bo// klu rgyal rgya mche dang ni e la'i 'dag// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin bsrung bar byed// bdag gis lha ma yin dang dri 'dang

322b4(rgyud): brdung bar byed// dge ba'i lha de dag dang chu'i rgyal po dang ma mo la sogs pa de dag kyang so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis kyang rtag par thugs

322b7(rgyud): dge ba'i me'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas lam yang dag pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro// gal te ri dang nags tshal darang dgon pa dag tu gnas pa las chu dang me dag gis songs par gyur na yang klu'i rgyal
322b8(rgyud): dag gis yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir chu dang me dag mngon par sprul par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa da
323a1(rgyud): \u0f7f// gached du gnod pa dang bsregs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir shin tu bsil ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ga zhig ri dang 'brog dgran song ba las// ga dang spyang gi ga
323a2(rgyud): gtum po dang // rtsangs bskul dang dre srin drang gyur kyang // gzungs 'di 'don pa thos na gnod mi nus// gang zheg

323a8(rgyud): nad bsal zhes tshe ni ring bar 'gyur// klu gdon chubs gtses te spangs pa dang // shu 'bras me bzad nag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe// rtse gcig zugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas nas// mchil ma
323b1(rgyud): bkrus pas spangs pa zhe// sems can rtogs pas ma dag bskyed pas na// byad snyems sngags dang dgras ni gtses pa'i tshe// rtse gcagazugs rje chen po'i gzungs pa zlas na// stems gnod de kun pa
323b2(rgyud): khrel 'du// sreg 'phel snyigs mas dam chos 'jig pa na// 'dod pa'i mtshan sa mas ni tshangs logapas// khyo shugs song gzhan la 'dod don nas// rten mtshan lag pas margyan ni me
323b3(rgyud): gang zhig zugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i me ni log pa'i sems bsal 'chur// bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mtha stobs rgyas brjod na// bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yod mi 'gyur// 
323b4(rgyud): sngags 'dil na lnga bzlas te tshon sna lnga'i skud pal mdud pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i mdud nas mgul tu gdags par bya'o// gzungs 'di nyid 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu
323b5(rgyud): dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub pa yong su ma rdzogs pa dag yong ts+tsha grus kyi phyir dag kya mu
323b6(rgyud): di skar du du me mu babyed pa bya ba'i byed dang / shan thos kyi gang zag gang dag 'bras bu mngon du ma byas pa de dag myur du mngon du bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drang gro
323b7(rgyud): dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag sbyar du sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can gang dag theg pa chen po 'di la ngad ga'i dbang po mthob pa dag gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ma
323b8(rgyud): ka pa chen po'i sa bon dang chos kyi mu ku 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin pas bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje'i mthus de dag gis ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'byor par
324a1(rgyud): // gzhan yang snang gsum kyi stang chen pa' 'ag tad bdun dgags gnas su nga 'gra gsum po'i sems can snyed gnas padag bdag shi na sngags 'dis
324a2(rgyud): na thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang pa mtha' pa dag ni gyur du thob par 'atur la/ sa bcu pa'i bar du yang mthab thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ma
324a3(rgyud): ngas kyi sa'i bar du yang phyin par byed pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad brgyad cu yang rang gi rang gis thob par 'gyur ro// gal te nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag gzungs 'dzin 'ar phan cig
324a4(rgyud): par kur tam/ gsungs 'di spyod cing yi ger brims sa/ dang po sems kyis ches bzhin du gnas par byed na/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bub ni pi dag ma btsal bar rang gi rang gis zab par 'gyur ro// sna
324a5(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri dang / chu klung dang / brag dang / rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i na ji snyed pa dag kyang g.yo zhing khol bar nus so// ri rab lhun po na sar khor yug gi bar dag kyang g.yo zhing
324a6(rgyud): na bzhin du 'jig par nus so// de na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyang thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems paskyed par nus so// sems cad gang dag tshe 'di nyid la smon pa rnams mngon pa
324a7(rgyud): grub par 'dod na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du gso sbyong dang / tshul khrims la gnas nas gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas na gdon mi za bar smon pa rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ 'khor
324a8(rgyud): mtha' nas 'khor ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du yang sdig pa'i las thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nang dang phyiro nas
324b1(rgyud): rnas dang / byang chub sems da 'ang snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / na byin dang / rgyal ba chen pa bzhi dang / sgra dang drang srang dang / klu'i rgyal po ji skad gnas pa lasas cad rdzas kyang mthu
324b2(rgyud): shes par 'gyur ro// lha 'am mi gang yang rung ste/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag tu krung ngam/ rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas pa las de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni de dag gis lus bcu
324b3(rgyud): dus sus la rig pa 'jung na/ sdig pa'i las dge' na ma thob lce ba thams cad yongs su kyang nas shing 'angs su dag pa dag dam las rdzas te b+ha bad+ma grang bas mangs dang / drod gshed da / sdong las sru ba
324b4(rgyud): lus len par mi 'gyur na len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha tod du 'don pa lnga smos kyang ci dgas/ gzungs 'di 'dod cing les su 'dzin par drag lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i tshe nu chen po langs te
324b5(rgyud): nga thag de'i lus dang / snga dang / skra dang / gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa rje phyogs su seng ba'i sems can gcan gying bu sa reg par du na/ dgag gi sprib pa dang sdigs
324b6(rgyud): yongs su 'byung bar 'thun pas yang ngan 'gre gsum po dgag rnam par smin pa myang bar mi 'gyur shing / rtam par sangs rgyas kyi sran sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na mongs su 'dzin pa dadag kris bsod nams pa
324b7(rgyud): bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bsam kyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byed pa'i kha nas ji tsam du tshig tu brjod par byung ba dge yang rung mi dag yang rung ste/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang / 
324b8(rgyud): stegs cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / 'dre srin thams cad kyis thos par kur na de dag thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nyid du 'gyur bas/ de la sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i sems
325a1(rgyud): bskyed nas bkur sti dang / rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gteng nyid du rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas gang gA'i rlung
325a2(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis phangs shing gces par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni 'od can gyi lus kyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer
325a3(rgyud): nga bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni byams pa dang / snying rje'i gter len par rig par bya ste/ 'di ltar gzungs kyis sems can yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni dam pa'i chos kyi
325a4(rgyud): rjod yin par rig par bya ste/ gzungs kyi sgra thams mad kun bsdud par byed pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sde snor yin par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rnams
325a5(rgyud): ga par mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni nam mkha' mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ rtag par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis sems can pa pa lta ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i
325a6(rgyud): mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ lha dang klu dang dge ba'i lha rnams rtag par yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni dam pa'i tshig gi mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ kha nas gzungs kyi sgra 'byung ba la rgyu
325a7(rgyud): chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni rtag par gnas pa'i gtar yin par rig par bya ste/ 'jigs pa gsum gyi bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni rnam par grol ba'i
325a8(rgyud): mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu skye can rnams kyis bshol bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// gang bag de ni sran gyi rgyal po'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ rtag par gzungs kyis se
325b1(rgyud): sa rnams kyi na dgas pa 'ape 'o// gang cag dun rdzu 'phrul gyi gtor yin par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gang rnams su chugs dang dbang thob pa'i phyir ro// de bas na gang zag de'i yon tan gyi ba
325b2(rgyud): brjod na nam yang bathar thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su sgranas tshe ring ba'i sman yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas dben pa'i gnas su 'a

325b6(rgyud): rurungs kar la yan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtong nas mtshams gcad par bya'o// lang na 'du shes kyis glang du phyin pa tshun chad mtshams su 'gyur ro// yang na thal bas
325b7(rgyud): ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshams gcad par bya'o// yang na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhing bskor nas mtshams gcad par

326a5(rgyud): sa la gnas nas sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nasra bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas byas pa'i sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs ma col bshags te/

329b1(rgyud): ming tsam yang thos par mi 'gyur na mngon du mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha dang mi dang klu la sogs pa'i 'khar mnga'i khyed la 'angs gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa zos nas thams cad kyis rjes
